He makes scarves which are sold in Cambodia and Europe and uses the income from his weaving to pay for his family’s expenses, to buy diesel and fertilizer for his fields, and to develop his business. 

Phoeun is requesting a loan to buy silk and pay to dye it and prepare his loom. This will be his fourth loan. Thanks to lenders, Phoeun has made and sold more than 130 scarves. Please support him so he can keep making beautiful and traditional hand-woven scarves!

loans.use: to buy silk and pay for dyeing and loom preparation

loans.name: Valeria Betsabe

texts.es:
Sosote es una parroquia del cantón Rocafuerte  que se dedica directamente al arte de elaboración de objetos con tagua, tras un extenso proceso de pulido y pintado dan vida a más de 10 mil figuras,  también ofrece la muy solicitada longaniza o salchicha de vísceras de cerdo, estas se veden fritas o como sopa, toda esa delicia se prepara en las ollas de barro típicas de la zona.
En este lugar vive la señora Valeria, tiene 20 años de edad, es madre soltera de una niña de tres años. Ella vive en casa de sus padres.
Doña Valeria tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa,  ahí vende todo tipo de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, verduras y frutas,  trabaja todos los días desde las 07h00 hasta las 21h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, su hermana le ayuda en su trabajo cuando ella puede y está desocupada, pero por lo general es ella la que más pasa en su negocio ya que es ahí donde le gusta estar ya que además de ganarse la vida se entretiene y se informa de las novedades que pasan a su alrededor. Tiene cuatro años en esta actividad y le va muy bien.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir más su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes  y  recargas telefónicas. Está en el Grupo De Crédito  hace 1 años y le gusta la unidad del grupo y lo que es el seguro médico. Su sueño es que su negocio crezca más.
texts.en:
Sosote, a parish in the canton of Rocafuerte, is known for its handicrafts made from the nut of the tagua palm. After extensive polishing and painting, local artisans give life to more than ten thousand figures. This area also offers the local pork sausages, which are in high demand and sold fried or made into soup. These traditional delicacies are prepared in clay pots from the region.

This is where Valeria lives. She is 20 years old, and the single mother of a three-year-old girl. She lives with her parents.

Valeria has a grocery store located at home. She sells all kinds of products including rice, sugar, oils, detergents, legumes, vegetables and fruits. She works every day from 7 am to 9 pm, and sometimes longer.

She gets some help for her business when her sister is free and available, but in general it is Valeria who puts in the work hours. She enjoys it, not only because she is earning a living, but also she is entertained staying in contact with people and informed of what's happening. She's been doing this work for four years, and it is going very well.

She will use this loan to stock her store. She'll buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, and prepaid phone cards. 

She joined the credit group a year ago, she likes its solidarity and the medical coverage offered. Her dream is to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, and prepaid phone cards.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is a single woman with one child. For the past 18 years, she has been a farmer who keeps dairy cows and also grows crops. Catherine’s business is located in an area with business potential and she has regular customers. She describes herself to be industrious. Catherine’s biggest business challenge is weather changes. 

Catherine is requesting a 70,000 KES loan to buy animal feed and seeds. This will be her third loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Catherine’s business goal is to have more dairy cows within five years and she hopes to sustain her family.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and seeds

loans.name: Naiser Jose

texts.es:
En su canoa, Naiser a trasportado a muchas personas a través de las veredas del municipio de Lorica. Trabaja todos los días durante 10 horas prestando este servicio.

Con este trabajo puede llevar el sustento a su familia que con ansias lo esperan todos los días.

Hoy en día pide un apoyo económico para la compra de madera y sillas para realizar el mantenimiento, mejoramiento y reparación de su canoa.

Con este préstamo podrá garantizar un mejor servicio, con mejor calidad y seguridad para sus clientes.

Mejora el negocio de este colombiano con un préstamo!
texts.en:
In this canoe, Naiser has transported many people around the villages of the municipality of Lorica.  He works every day for 10 hours lending his service.

With this job, he can bring sustenance to his family who wait anxiously for him every day. 

Now he is asking for a loan to buy wood and chairs to do maintenance, improvements, and repair on his canoe. 

With this loan, he can guarantee a better service with better quality and safety for his customers. 

Improve this Colombian's business with a loan!

loans.use: To buy wood and chair to do maintenance, improvement, and repair on his canoe.

loans.name: Ledis Edith

texts.es:
Ledis se ha caracterizado entre sus clientes como una mujer amable y carismática, con 36 años de edad, se dedica a atender su propio negocio, pues tiene una cocina en la cual prepara almuerzos y desayunos.

Su experiencia la obtuvo con su madre a lo largo de su vida.

El crédito que solicita es un apoyo para comprar surtido al por mayor de queso, carne, verduras, entre otros, así tendrá más insumos e ingredientes para ofrecer a sus clientes y satisfacer los diferentes gustos y necesidades; lo que le generará mejores ventas e ingresos para seguir luchando para cumplir su propósito a mediano plazo, que es mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda, en la que pueda compartir con su familia y que su negocio le genere mayor rentabilidad para dar a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ledis is known as a friendly and charismatic woman by her customers. She is 36 years old, and she makes a living running her own business, as she has a kitchen in which she prepares breakfasts and lunches.

Ledis gained experience throughout her life alongside her mother.

The loan that Ledis is requesting will help to buy an assortment of cheese, meat, and vegetables among other things at wholesale. Through this, she will have more supplies and ingredients to offer to her customers in order to satisfy different tastes and meet different needs. This will generate more sales and income for Ledis to continue to fight to achieve her mid-term goal which is to improve the conditions of her home which she shares with her family. She also hopes that her business will be more profitable as a result of this, so that she can give her children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of cheese, meat, and vegetables among other things at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy seasonal fresh fruit in bulk for her husband to sell

loans.name: Julia Maria

texts.es:
Julia ha podido acumular grandes experiencias gratas en su vida, una de ellas es el haber podido tener a sus hijos.

Es una madre amorosa y responsable y tiene muy presente el significado de la familia en su proceso productivo.

Ella siempre fue muy inquieta y con gran vocación de servicio, cualidades que la motivaron para iniciar con su propia tienda de abarrotes y hacerla muy reconocida en el sector.

Hoy en día es una mujer amable y muy emprendedora, siempre buscando alternativas para que sus clientes se sientan bien atendidos y comprando productos de calidad.

Ella solicita apoyo económico para obtener un préstamo y realizar la compra de surtido de productos de la canasta familiar, pues planea aumentar su oferta de productos y desea tener un inventario mucho más grande, así podrá tener los productos disponibles para sus clientes. 

Su mayor sueño es poder tener una gran distribuidora de víveres, considera que poco a poco y con la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar puede lograrlo.

Con un préstamo que hagas hoy podrás mejorar la vida y el negocio de Julia!
texts.en:
Julia has been able to accumulate many great experiences in her life, one of them being able to have her children.  She is a loving and responsible mother, and she always keeps in mind the meaning of family in her production process.

She was always restless and had great dedication to service, qualities that motivated her to start her own general store and make herself renown in the town.  Today, she is a friendly and very entrepreneurial woman, always looking for alternatives so that her customers feel well attended to and buying quality products.

She is requesting this economic support to get a loan and be able to stock the products for the family store.  She plans to increase the products she offers and wants to have a much bigger inventory so that she can have the products available for her customers.

Her biggest dream is to be able to have a big general store; she thinks that little by little and with the help of Corporación Interactuar, she can achieve that.

With a loan that you make today, you could help improve Julia's life and business!

loans.use: To stock the products of the family store.

loans.name: Yolani Melisa

texts.es:
Yolani, ha podido formar una productiva bastante fuerte, ya que no solo prima el compromiso si no también los deseos de salir adelante y progresar como empresaria.

Ella se dedica a la cría y venta de cerdos, es una actividad aprendida de su familia y ha sido la principal fuente de ingresos durante mucho tiempo.

Ella pide un auxilio económico para comprar algunos cerdos pequeños e irlos cuidando y criando para posteriormente venderlos.

Es una mujer soñadora y con gran voluntad, tanto así que ya piensa en grande y desea tener una marranera con gran capacidad.

Tiene gran ilusión y expectativa con este proyecto y confía en el buen corazón de los prestamistas de Kiva para crecer como empresaria.

En tus manos esta que el negocio de Yolani prospere en el tiempo, Anímate!
texts.en:
Yolani has built a strong business and says that you can't make it as an entrepreneur unless you're willing to fully commit to your vision for your business.  She learned pig farming from her parents and now has her own animal sales business, raising and selling pigs.  The business is her main source of income.

Yolani is applying for a loan that she will use to buy piglets that she will raise and ultimately sell.  She knows what she wants her business to be and is working hard to grow it and become a major supplier of pigs.

Yolani hopes that Kiva lenders will open their hearts and support her vision for her business.  Please jump in to help Yolani now!

loans.use: to buy more pigs for her animal sales business.

loans.name: Maria Ofelia

texts.es:
Maria, a sus 56 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y pujante; pues siempre va en busca de alternativas que le permitan progresar. 

Desde hace 2 años se dedica a trabajar en el campo de la confección, el oficio lo aprendió de manera empírica y poco a poco fue perfeccionando su técnica y ampliando sus conocimientos por medio de la práctica, esto la impulsó para iniciar su propio taller, para lo cual adecuó un espacio en su casa y con unos ahorros que tenía compró sus primeras máquinas. 

Trabaja con una empleada todos los días durante 9 horas, pero en ocasiones recibe el apoyo de otra persona, dependiendo de la cantidad de trabajo que tenga; así ha logrado generar los recursos suficientes para solventar los gastos del hogar. 

El crédito que solicita en apoyo con la Corporación Interactuar es para el fortalecimiento de su labor, pues con el dinero realizara el mantenimiento a sus maquinas de confección y arreglara las sillas de trabajo.
 
Maria manifiesta que esta motivada para seguir prestando un mejor servicio y luchar para que el sueño de la acreditación de su negocio se haga realidad y le permita generar más oportunidades de empleo, así mejorará su calidad de vida y la de las personas que influyan en la labor.
texts.en:
Maria is 56 years old, and she is a hardworking and thriving woman, since she is always searching for alternative ways that will enable her to progress.

She has made a living as a seamstress for the past 2 years. She learned this trade through empirical observation, and she slowly perfected her technique and broadened her knowledge through practice. This inspired Maria to start her own sewing shop, for which she adapted an area of her home and bought her first sewing machines with some savings that she had.

Maria works with another employee everyday for 9 hours, but on occasion she receives the help of another person as well, depending on the workload that she has. Through this, she has managed to earn sufficient income to cover her household expenses.

The loan that Maria is requesting through the support of the Corporación Interactuar is for the strengthening of her business, since with the money she will perform maintenance on her sewing machines and fix her work chairs.

Maria expresses that she is motivated to continue providing better service and fighting to achieve her dream of accrediting her business. This will enable her to create more employment opportunities, and as a result, improve her quality of life and that of the other people who have influence at her work.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on her sewing machines, and fix her work chairs.

loans.name: Parveen's Group

texts.en:
Parveen is age 43; she is the mother of three children. Her husband holds the whole family; he is responsible for all expenses and utility bills. He is a hard-working and zealous man who owns a general store in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. He offers all kinds of goods related to books, tailoring and cosmetics. His shop is situated in an under-populated area and lots of customers are available here to offer miscellaneous items to; this is the reason he keeps stock of all kind of goods. He tries to offer all those products which are necessary and consumable in daily usage. He wants to offer additional bakery items such as bread, jam, milk, cookies, butter, sandwiches, patties, etc. But the major problem is a shortage of funds.

Therefore, Parveen has requested a loan from Kvia field partner BRAC Pakistan so that her husband will be able to buy additional bakery items such as bread, jam, milk, cookies, butter, sandwiches, patties, etc.

Parveen thanks Kiva and hopes that the lenders will support her.

loans.use: to buy bakery items for her husband's general store.

loans.name: Marcela Mercedes

texts.es:
Marcela con un gran espíritu trabajador y aventurero, se dedica a la venta de pescado desde hace 1 año con una meta fija que es la de poder salir adelante y poder construir junto a su familia un buen futuro.

Es soltera y siempre ha hecho hasta lo imposible para salir adelante.
Trabaja todos los días en su negocio durante jornadas de 7 horas en busca de una buena venta.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de pescado para mejorar su inventario y sus ingresos.

Ayuda a una humilde mujer de las tierras colombianas con un préstamo!
texts.en:
Marcela, with a big spirit of hard work and adventure, has worked selling fish for a year with the firm goal of getting ahead and being able to build a better future with her family.  She is single and has always done everything possible to get ahead.

She works every day in her business for 7 hours in search of a good sale.  She is requesting a loan to buy a stock of fish to improve her inventory and her income.

Help a humble woman from the Colombian lands with a loan!

loans.use: To buy a stock of fish to improve her inventory and her income.

loans.name: Susana

texts.es:
Susana tiene una despensa, en la que trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas, es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora que pone todo de si para poder ayudar a su familia y a sus seres queridos. comenta que su préstamo anterior le fue de mucha ayuda, ya que pudo seguir con sus ventas.
Hoy pide de nuevo este préstamo para poder comprar enlatados, leche, aceites, verduras, carne, panificados y otros, y con ello poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Susana has a general store where she works everyday starting very early in the morning. She is a very hardworking and entrepreneurial woman who puts forth all of herself to be able to help her family and loved ones. She says that the previous loan was very helpful for her, since she was able to continue selling her products. 

Today, Susana is requesting another loan to be able to buy canned goods, milk, oil, vegetables, meat, baked goods, and other things. With this, she will be able to continue selling her products in the way she has been doing.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, milk, oil, vegetables, meat, baked goods, and other things.

loans.name: Walter Antonio

texts.es:
Walter es un hombre de 56 años de edad el cual se desempeña como padre amoroso y como agricultor, en vista de que los ingresos no son suficientes para cubrir los gastos de su hogar, comenzó con una actividad que realiza en los ratos libres que le quedan como jornalero en otras fincas y es la cría y venta de cerdos de engorde con los que intenta mejorar las condición es de vida de su familia, ya que como cabeza de familia está a cargo de todos los gastos en su hogar por lo que no le queda mucho capital para invertir en su negocio. 

Es por esta razón que requiere un crédito para la compra de cerdos de engorde,  concentrados y materiales para el mejoramiento de su corral con los que podrá mejorar sus ventas e impulsar esta actividad, teniendo más activas en su micro negocio y haciendo más atractivo a la vista de los clientes pues tendrá más cerdos para ofertar.

Su principal sueño es poder generar buenos ingresos para no ver pasar a su familia ninguna necesidad pues es algo que vivió y que lo afecto de gran manera por esta razón trabaja incansablemente por sus hijos y su esposa.

Apoya con un préstamo a un campesino del campo Colombiano con grandes sueños para su familia!
texts.en:
Walter is 56 years old, and a loving father and farmer.  Seeing that his income wasn’t enough to cover his household expenses, he started working as a day laborer on other farms in his free time, and he's trying to improve his family’s living conditions by raising and selling fattening pigs. 

He is the head of the household and responsible for all of his home’s expenses, so he doesn’t have much capital left to invest in his business. That is why he needs a loan for the purchase of fattening pigs, feed concentrate, and materials for improving his pens. This will enable him to improve his sales and move forward with this occupation by having more assets in his micro-business and by making it more attractive looking to customers, as he will have more pigs to offer.

His principal dream is to be able to generate income to make sure that his family will not lack for anything they need, as that is something he lived through, and that affected him greatly.  This is the reason that he works tirelessly for his wife and children.

 This Colombian country farmer with big dreams for his family asks for the support of a loan.

loans.use: to purchase fattening pigs, feed concentrate, and materials for improving his pens.

loans.name: Lina Marcela

texts.es:
Lina una madre de dos hermosas y adorables niñas de 7 años y otra de 6 meses de edad,  a las cuales ama y da la vida por ellas, se dedica a la venta de mercancía, una actividad que inicio por gusto al trabajo independiente que descubrió cuando era estudiante y vendía cosas a sus amigos, aprendió sola de esta labor.

Trabaja diariamente durante 10 horas y quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de surtido de colchones y muebles para el hogar, de esta forma podrá abastecer su negocio y su inventario. 

Su mayor objetivo en su vida se centra en sus hijas y es poder darles una buena calidad de vida y pagar su educación.
texts.en:
Lina is the mother of two lovely and adorable girls. One is 7 years old the other is 6 months old. She loves them and gives her life for them. She sells merchandise. It is something she started doing because she likes the independent work, which she discovered when she was a student and sold things to her friends. She taught herself to do this work.

She works 10 hours a day, and she’s seeking a loan to buy a selection of mattresses and household furniture. This way she can stock her business and inventory.

Her main focus in life is her girls, and being able to offer them a good quality of life and pay for their education.

loans.use: to buy a selection of mattresses and furnitures for the home, in order to improve her sales.

loans.name: Edgar Augusto

texts.es:
Edgar es un hombre muy dedicado a su familia, presta el servicio de transporte de mercancía en un camión compartido con un socio en el municipio de El Carmen De Viboral.

Es un hombre amable, servicial y muy emprendedor, es casada  y padre de dos hijos a los que adora con todas sus fuerzas.

Solicita un préstamo para poder comprar el 50% del camión que le corresponde a su socio y así quedar con la totalidad del vehículo.

Con este crédito podrá tener un negocio totalmente propio y sus ingresos ya no serán divididos.

Apoya a Edgar con un préstamo hoy!
texts.en:
Edgar a man very dedicated to his family.  He lends his service of transporting goods in a truck that he shares with a partner in the municipality of El Carmen De Viboral.  He is a friendly, helpful, and very entrepreneurial man.  He is married and the father of two children whom he adores with all his might.

He is requesting a loan to be able to buy the 50% of the truck that belongs to his partner so that he can own the whole vehicle.  With this loan, he could have his totally own business and his income will not be divided.

Support Edgar with a loan today!

loans.use: To buy the 50% of the truck that belongs to his partner so that he can own the whole vehicle.

loans.name: Deyanira

texts.es:
Deyanira, una mujer de 48 años de edad que ha dado toda intentando salir adelante y superando las adversidades que se les han presentado en la vida; gracias a una tienda que con mucho esfuerzo, paciencia y sacrificio logro montar, ha generado los ingresos para su sostenimiento. 
Trabaja con un familiar todos los días durante 8 horas.

Buscando ser la mejor empresa familiar del sector quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de surtido que le permitan aumentar su inventario como gaseosas, cervezas y otras bebidas.

De esta forma ira superando dificultades como las bajas ventas, poco inventario y la competencia.

Este crédito será la gran oportunidad para consolidarse como la tienda más productiva en el barrio y le dará la oportunidad de cumplir ese sueño que tanto ha anhelado de mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda.
Apoya a Deyanira con su negocio!
texts.en:
Deyanira, 48, has met every obstacle that life has thrown at her, always moving forward no matter what.  She has her own corner shop now, a business that required her hard work, patience and sacrifice.  The business is her main source of income.  She and a relative work in the store every day, 8 hours a day.

Deyanira wants to improve her business and says that she would like to have the best grocery in the area.  For now, she is applying for a loan that she will use to stock her business with beer, soft drinks and other beverages.  The investment will help her to overcome the challenges she faces: many competitors, scarce inventory and too few customers.  The loan will give Deyanira a chance to make her business the most productive in the neighborhood and generate the earnings she needs to fulfill her greatest dream: Improving her house.

Please help Deyanira improve her business.

loans.use: to stock her corner shop.

loans.name: Rafael Medardo

texts.es:
Rafael con 42 años de edad, es separado y es padre de 2 hijos. Durante su vida productiva se ha dedicado a diversas actividades de manera independiente, con lo que ha generado ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia. 

Hace 18, comenzó a realizar la actividad de comercialización de cerdos, pues los compra, los cría, engorda y posteriormente los vende según el peso adquirido por el animal, esto le permite obtener los recursos para continuar con el cuidado y sustento de sus hijos. 

El titular es un hombre luchador, pujante, se esmera cada día para salir adelante motivado por su familia, esto lo impulsó a solicitar el crédito con la Corporación Interactuar, para invertirlo en la compra de cerdos y lechones, así podrá tener disponibilidad suficiente para cumplir con los pedidos que le solicitan y mejorará su margen de utilidad e ingresos. 

De esta manera, Rafael espera avanzar un paso más hacia el cumplimiento de su sueño principal, que es incrementar su utilidad y mejorar sus ventas, lograr una estabilidad económica para darles a sus hijos la oportunidad de una mejor educación y tener buenas condiciones de vida.

Mejora la vida de este colombiano con un préstamo!
texts.en:
Rafael is 42 years old, and he is separated and he is the father of 2 children. During his productive life, he has made a living in a variety of occupations by working independently. Through this, he has earned income to support his family. 

Eighteen years ago, Rafael began working in the commercialization of pigs. He buys, raises and fattens pigs, and then sells them according to the weight of the animal. This has enabled him to earn income to care for and support his children.

Rafael fights and thrives, he goes through great pains everyday to get ahead motivated by his family. This has inspired him to request a loan with the Corporación Interactuar to buy pigs and piglets. Through this, he will have the availability to fulfill the requests made to him, and improve his profit margin and earn more income. 

In this way, Rafael hopes to move one step closer to his main dream, which is to increase his usefulness, improve his sales, and achieve economic stability in order to give his children the opportunity of a better education and good living conditions.

Improve the life of this Colombian with a loan!

loans.use: to buy pigs and piglets, in order to have the availability to fulfill the requests made to him.

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El grupo La Esperanza está en su ciclo número 6 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Una de las integrantes que se destaca por ser una persona muy trabajadora es la Sra. Juana, quien es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora.
Ella tiene una peluquería, y también trabaja en hacer manicura, comenta que por medio de su trabajo tiene los medios para poder mantener a su familia y darles una vida digna y sin privaciones. Este grupo es muy unido y luchador.
Juana pide este préstamo para poder comprar shampoo, enjuagues, cremas, tintes, y otros, para poder seguir con su buen servicio a sus clientes. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder mejorar cada día.
texts.en:
The group La Esperanza is in the 6th cycle of the program for the committee of women, in which everyone works and helps each other to get ahead. 

One of the members highlighted for being a very hardworking person is Sra. Juana, who is a very hardworking and tenacious woman. She has a hair salon, and she also gives manicures. She says that through her work, she has the resources to be able to support her family, and give them a decent life and meet their needs. This group is very united and determined. 

Juana is requesting a loan to be able to buy shampoo, mouthwash, creams, hair color, and other things to be able to continue to offer good service to her clients. She is thankful for the opportunity she is receiving to be able to improve everyday.

loans.use: to buy shampoo, mouthwash, creams, hair color, and other supplies.

loans.name: Dora Cecilia

texts.es:
Dora es una mujer solidaria de 48 años de edad que busca a través del Micro-crédito una solución para tener una mejor entrada de dinero suficiente para sostenerse. 

Tiene un almacén en el que vende ropa, bolsos y accesorios para dama, atiende a sus clientes siempre con un excelente servicio pues sabe que de estos depende la sostenibilidad de su negocio.

Trabaja 5 días a la semana durante 5 horas.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de bolsos, pues desea aumentar su capacidad de inventario y así poder afrontar su principal dificultad que es la falta de capital.
texts.en:
Dora is a caring, 48 year old woman who, through microfinance, is looking for a way to increase her income, so she has enough to get by.

She has a store, where she sells clothing, bags and accessories for ladies. She always looks after her customers with excellent service, as she knows that they the sustainability of her business depends on them. She works five days a week, for five hours a day.

She is requesting a loan to buy a selection of bags, as she wishes to increase her stock. This way she can deal with her principal difficulty:a lack of capital.

loans.use: to buy a selection of bags, as she wishes to increase her stock

loans.name: Elvia Ligia

texts.es:
Humilde y trabajadora, así es Elvia, una mujer guerrera que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos, vive en el municipio de Caicedo, donde se gana la vida con la preparación de arepas en una pequeña cocina ubicada en su casa.
Trabaja sola todos los días durante 5 horas.
Sus alimentos son conocidos por los vecinos del sector, quienes visitan su negocio porque saben que podrán obtener alimentos deliciosos.

Elvia ha decidido mejorar su negocio y aumentar sus ventas, por esta razón acude a un préstamo para comprar ingredientes e insumos para sus arepas como maíz y queso.
Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia y su negocio.

Apoya a esta mujer con un préstamo y haz realidad sus sueños!
texts.en:
Elvia is a modest, hard-working woman, a trouper who has has spent much of her life raising and caring for her children.  She lives in Caicedo and has a business making and selling arepas.  She makes them in her small kitchen, working every day, 5 hours a day.  Her food is well-known in the neighborhood and her customers know they're in for a treat when they come to buy from her.

Elvia wants to improve and grow her business.  She is applying for a loan that she will use to buy the supplies she needs--maize, cheese, etc.--to carry on her food business.  The investment will allow her to continue supporting her family and her business.  

Please support Elvia with your loans and help make her dreams come true!

loans.use: to buy supplies for her prepared food business.

loans.name: San Francisco Group

texts.es:
19 son las mujeres que integran este grupo, formado en la ciudad de San Pedro, una zona eminentemente rural, donde todas ponen todo de sí para ir mejorando poco a poco y por medio del programa de comité de mujeres. Cada una de ellas son mujeres jefas de familia muy luchadoras.
La señora Daniela se dedica a lavar ropas de los funcionarios públicos de la zona,  por medio de este trabajo se gana la vida de una manera digna y sacrificada. Comenta que su trabajo es muy duro y sacrificado, pero ella lucha y pone todo de su para poder crecer.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar jabones en polvo, lavandinas, suavizantes y otros, y con ello podrá seguir dando un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder mejorar cada día.
texts.en:
There are 19 women in this group, which began in the city of San Pedro. This is a primarily rural area, where the women give their all to keep improving little by little through the women’s committee program. Each of them is the head of a family and they’re all very driven.

Señora Daniela washes clothes for public officials in the area. She earns her living this way, with dignity and sacrifice. She says that her work is very hard and demanding, but she struggles and puts all of herself into it in order to grow. 

She is seeking a loan to buy powdered soap, bleach, fabric softener and other things, and with that be able to continue to give better service to her customers. She is grateful for the opportunity she is has received to be able to improve with each day.

loans.use: to buy powdered soap, bleach, fabric softener and other things.

loans.name: Raul Antonio

texts.es:
Raul es un padre muy responsable de 4 hijos, ha tenido que pasar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo siempre ha tenido la fortaleza para salir adelante y continuar progresando con su familia. 

Hace un tiempo montó su venta de huevos, para lo cual tiene una cantidad de gallinas que le permiten tener ciertas ventas. 

Sueña con ver su negocio crecer y sabe que con la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar y de las personas que apoyen su oficio podrá lograrlo.

Es por esto que busca un préstamo que le permita comprar más gallinas y alimento para poder incrementar su capacidad de producción de huevos y así responder a la demanda de sus clientes por los huevos.

De esta manera sus ventas se incrementarán considerablemente, además de que su negocio resurgirá y podrá salir adelante. 

Raul también desea tener un gran negocio donde pueda utilizar toda la capacidad que pueda para sacarlo adelante y así ofrecerles a sus hijos un futuro económico estable.
texts.en:
Raul is a good dad to his 4 children.  He has faced many obstacles in his life, but he has always found the strength to move forward and provide for his family.  He started his own egg business several years ago and has enough hens now to make a small profit with it.  He wants to grow the business and knows that he can succeed with help from Corporacion Interactuar and its partners.  

Raul is applying for a loan, part of which he will use to buy more hens and the rest to buy feed.  The investment will allow him to increase his egg production and meet demand from his customers.  More eggs will, he hopes, mean more income.

Raul hopes to go on expanding his business so that he can give his children a more prosperous future.

loans.use: to buy hens and supplies for his egg-sales business.

loans.name: Diego Alejandro

texts.es:
Fue en el año 2012 cuando Diego realizo el paso más importante en su vida laboral, tomo la decisión de volverse una persona emprendedora, monto un negocio de panadería el cual opera actualmente.

Meses de sacrificio, días de jornadas laborales extensas, préstamos, fueron solo algunas de las situaciones que vivió Diego para consolidar y mantener su negocio, y cuenta con tres empleados, tiene la panadería muy bien constituida, pero sus clientes le piden que tenga mesas, sillas, donde ellos se puedan sentar a disfrutar un buen café con un pan recién salido del horno.

Comprar una vivienda propia es el sueño de Diego, vive con su pareja en un hogar arrendado espera que en el futuro pueda estar pagando un hogar propio, donde puedan procrear un hijo.

Diego necesita un aliento económico para la compra de sillas, mesas, manteles y capital de trabajo para comprar insumos y bebidas, tú puedes apoyar el crecimiento de este empresario que necesita una mano extra y se compromete a pagar su cuotas cumplidamente.
texts.en:
It was in 2012 when Diego made the most important step in his working life. He made the decision to become an entrepreneur and opened a bakery which he runs today.

Months of sacrifice, long days of extensive labor, loans were only some of the situations that Diego went through to consolidate and maintain his business. It has three employees and is a very well established bakery but his customers want him to have tables and chairs where they can sit down and enjoy a good coffee with bread recently out of the oven.

Diego dreams of buying his own house. He lives with his partner in a leased home and hopes in the future to be able to pay for his own house where he can have a child. Diego needs an economic boost to buy chairs, tables, table cloths and working capital to buy supplies and drinks. You can support this entrepreneur that needs a helping hand who promises to faithfully pay his loan installments.

loans.use: to buy chairs, tables, table covers and working capital to buy supplies and drinks.

loans.name: Jorge Eliecer

texts.es:
Jorge es un empresario de 33 años de edad que se encuentra actualmente en su hogar ya que su herramienta que es su vehículo necesita una reparación del motor, no cuenta con capital, por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo para realizar las reparaciones necesarias que le permitan salir a la calle a seguir dando su servicio de transporte el cual genera el sustento de suyo porque vive solo y el de sus hijos de 8 y 6 años de edad.

Jorge sueña con un día poder comprar una vivienda propia y pagar la educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Jorge is a 33 year old business owner who is currently at home as his vehicle, his main tool, needs repairs to the motor. 

He doesn't have any funds, so he is requesting a loan to undertake the necessary repairs, which will allow him to get back out onto the streets offering his transport services. This is what generates sustenance for himself, as he lives alone, and for his two children aged 8 and 6. 

Jorge dreams of one day buying his own home, and of paying for his children's education.

loans.use: to repair his car's motor.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 31 years old and has three children. She is married and has two children who are in school.

Elizabeth is in the agricultural business, farming sugar cane in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Elizabeth has been in this business for four years now, and has borrowed one time in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Elizabeth would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Rosiris Isabel

texts.es:
Rosiris es una madre de 48 años de edad, emprendedora y dinámica. 

Con el ánimo de generar ingresos para aportar a la economía familiar, decidió iniciar su propio negocio de preparación de alimentos en su hogar para vender, así ha logrado solventar los gastos familiares y personales durante los meses que lleva funcionando su negocio. 
El crédito que solicita estará destinado para la compra de utensilios de cocina, insumos, e ingredientes como arroz, panela, carne, verduras, entre otros, esto le permitirá continuar con su labor y ofrecer sus alimentos de una mejor manera, abriendo paso para un mejoramiento en las ventas y por ende, en los ingresos que percibe. 

Rosiris, con su espíritu de superación y su proyección hacia la consecución de sus objetivos, se traza la meta de ampliar su negocio, para tener la capacidad de atender a mayor cantidad de clientes, mejorando así la rentabilidad del establecimiento para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosiris, 48, is an energetic and enterprising woman.  When her family needed an extra income last year, she decided to start her own food-sales business.  She makes the food at home and her earnings help to support the family.  

Rosiris is applying for a loan that she will use to buy kitchen utensils, restaurant supplies and the ingredients she needs--meat, rice, vegetables, etc.--to carry on her business and improve the service that she delivers to her customers.  The investment will lead to more sales and, in turn, a greater income for Rosiris and her family.

For the future, Rosaris wants a better quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy the supplies she needs for her food business.

loans.name: Orlando De Jesus

texts.es:
Orlando es un hombre de 45 años de edad que vive junto con su esposa, con la cual trabaja en un negocio de fabricación y venta de calzado, atrás del almacén que se ve en la foto esta la fábrica donde realizan todos y cada uno de los zapatos exhibidos los cuales se hacen parte artesanalmente y otra parte en máquina.
 La experiencia la adquirió a lo largo de su vida como empleado en trabajos similares, llego el momento que dijo basta quiero dejar de ser un asalario y montar un negocio con el que quiere mejorar la calidad de vida de mi familia y pagar la educación de mis muchachos.
Hoy Orlando no solo genera el sustento y una vida digna en el hogar, paga los estudios de sus hijos, está cumpliendo la promesa pero va por más, ya que se está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de otra máquina para pegar y bordar zapatos con lo que piensa duplicar su producción y así vender en otros almacenes su calzado.
texts.en:
Orlando is a 45-year-old man who lives with his wife, with whom he works in their business manufacturing and selling shoes. In back of the warehouse seen in the photo is a factory where they make each and every one of the shoes exhibited. They make them in part by hand and in part by machine. 

His experience was acquired over a lifetime as an employee doing similar work. Then there came the moment when he said “That's enough, I want to cease working on salary and found a business with which I hope to improve life for my family and pay for the education of my children.”

Today, Orlando not only generates the sustenance and a dignified life in his home, paying for his children's studies. He is fulfilling his promise and he wants to do  more. For that reason, he is requesting a loan to purchase another machine to glue and embroider shoes, hoping to double his production and, thus, be able to sell his shoes in other stores.

loans.use: to expand production, buying another machine to glue and embroider shoes.

loans.name: Pedro Jose

texts.es:
Pedro es un adorable abuelito de 67 años de edad, muy trabajador constante, simpático y carismático que se dedica a la venta de alimentos, gracias a este negocio genera el sustento para su hogar, no cuenta con una pensión solo con su trabajo, es padre de 4 hijos, ya todos ellos son mayores de edad y tiene sus respectivas familias.

Pedro en su puesta de venta que ubica en todo el frente de su casa vende pasteles, tortas de carne, empanas, papas rellenas, tortas de chócolo y las bebidas para acompañar el alimento. 
 
Generar empleo, sostenibilidad de su negocio, montar sucursales es su meta, su deseo, y más ahora que está entrando a una edad donde los años empiezan a pesar, debe hacer todo lo posible para emplear personas y que el negocio sea sostenible para pagar un salario y su mantenimiento, cabe aclarar que vive con su esposa.

Pedro quiere realizar una inversión para la compra de activos fijos, necesita comprar mesas, sillas, manteles, cubiertos, vasos, platos, vitrina y una maquina para jugos.
texts.en:
Pedro is an adorable 67 year old grandfather. He is a constant worker, friendly and charismatic who works selling food. Thanks to this business he generates the sustenance for his household. He is the father of four who are all adults and have their own families and he has no pension only his work.

Pedro from his sales stand located in front of his house sells pastries, meat pies, empanadas, stuffed potatoes corn pies and drinks to accompany the food. To generate employment, sustain his business, open branches are his goal and desire more so as he is approaching the age when the years start to weigh heavy he has to do all he can to employ people and have a sustainable business to pay his salary and maintenance. It is worth mentioning that he lives with his wife.

Pedro wants to make an investment to buy fixed assets. He needs to buy tables, chairs, table cloths, cutlery, dishes, plates, a display case and a juice machine.

loans.use: to buy tables, chairs, table cloths, cutlery, dishes, plates, a display case and a juice machine.

loans.name: Fredrick

texts.en:
Fredrick is a married man. He has one child. He operates a transport business where he transports customers using his motorcycle. He has been involved in this business for two years. His primary customers are regular ones. 

Fredrick describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient working capital. He will use the Kes 90,000 loan to service and maintain his motorcycle. He hopes that in the future, he will be a transport manager.

loans.use: to service and maintain his motorcycle

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Elsie is 52 years old and three of her children are in school.

Elsie has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 5000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Elsie has been in this business for five years. In the future, Elsie would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Hatice

texts.en:
Hatice is living with her mother.  She worked in the private sector for many years and retired.  She attended various courses and learned how to make hand-knitted dolls.  She knitted dolls with various characters.  

Hatice applied for a microcredit, purchased threads for her dolls and increased the number of her dolls and her sales.  With the help of her second loan she is planning to buy a knitting machine and develop her business.

Translated from Turkish by Maya staff

Hatice hanım annesi ile beraber yaşıyor.  Uzun yıllar özel sektörde çalışarak emekli olmuş çeşitli kurslara katılmış ve örgü bebek yapımı öğrenmiş.  Örgü bebekleri çeşitli karakterlerde yaparak satışa sunmaya başlamış.  Mikro krediye başvurarak örgü bebekler için ip almış ve üretmeye devam etmiş ve satışlarını artırmış.  İkinci kredisi ile örgü makinesi alarak üretimini artırarak satışlarını da artırmak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy a knitting machine

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is a married man. He describes himself to be optimistic and hardworking

He operates a transport business where he transports customers using a motorcycle. Moses has been involved in this business for 3 years. His business is located in a busy bus stage and his primary customers are regular. Moses describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient working capital.

He will use the 80,000 KES loan to buy another motorcycle. His business goal is to have a transport company within 5 years. He hopes that, in the future, he will have a better life. This is his third loan with SMEP Microfinance bank, and a previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy another motorcycle

loans.name: Filma

texts.en:
Filma is 50 years old and a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Filma has a business buying & selling bread in the Philippines. She requested a 10,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy more bread to sell in her business.

Filma has been in this business for 13 years. In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more bread to sell in her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock of household goods and farm tools for selling, which he hopes will enable him to serve more customers and make more income

loans.name: Geralyn

texts.en:
Geralyn is 29 years old and has three children. She is married and has two children who are in school.

Geralyn is in an agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested an 8,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Geralyn has been in this business for 1 year now, and has borrowed 2 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Geralyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Emzar

texts.en:
Emzar is 48 years old. He lives in a small village in Zugdidi district with his wife and daughter.

Emzar has a car and serves local people as a taxi driver to generate income. His wife is unemployed and stays home, and his daughter works as a stylist at a local beauty salon. The total monthly income for the family is about 500 GEL monthly.
 
Emzar is a very hardworking man and has a great desire to start up a husbandry business. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables him to get a loan of 2,500 GEL. With the received credit, Emzar will purchase a cow. The family will start producing dairy products and sell locally.

Emzar hopes that the business will be successful and he will be able to increase the family income. He awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase a cow and start producing dairy products to sell and increase income

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en: Jocelyn, 42, is married with four children, three of whom are in school. For five years, she has raised livestock in the Philippines. Jocelyn requested a 8000 PHP loan through Kiva's partner, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF), to buy vitamins and other supplies to raise her livestock. She has borrowed two times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business. In the future, Jocelyn would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Mueen

texts.en: Mueen is a 47-year-old married man from Deir Albalah, Gaza Strip, Palestine. He lives with his wife and four kids in a small house. Mueen works as an employee where he gets a low and unstable income. He wants to improve his family's living conditions, but his income is barely covering all the family's needs. Mueen took a murabaha loan (non-interest bearing loan) from Kiva's partner, Palestine for Credit & Development. This loan will help him buy a solar water-heating system for his house. This will help him to provide hot water without using electricity.

loans.use: to buy a solar water-heating system for his house

loans.name: Marhabo

texts.en: Marhabo is a talented and cheerful girl. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1993. She is single and lives in a small town with her parents. She is a fourth year student at the university, and this year she is graduating with her bachelor's degree. She is an active student, studies hard, and has good grades. She is well known among friends and course mates as a strong, responsible and modest person. She appealed to Kiva's partner, IMON International, for help to pay her tuition fee at the university. She hopes to be supported by KIVA lenders and awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to pay her tuition fee at the university

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is 43 years old, married, and blessed with one child. He also supports a family of three members. 

He sells secondhand clothes and the business has been profitable. 

He will be using the loan to buy more stock of clothes to sell, and he hopes this will enable him to serve more customers and make more income to support his family. He plans to use the anticipated profits to educate his child. 

His future hopes and dreams are to open a boutique and be successful.

loans.use: To buy more stock of clothes to sell, and he hopes this will enable him to serve more customers and make more income to support his family.

loans.name: Khalil

texts.en:
Khalil is a 43-year-old married man and father of nine children. He is a Palestinian refugee who lives in a Palestinian refugee camp. 

In 2008, he opened his grocery store and started to improve it gradually. Khalil is a hardworking and ambitious man. He does his best to provide his family with the best and healthiest living. Khalil is well known among his region and has a good reputation among his customers. 

Today he is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to develop his business and increase his merchandise with new items and products requested by his customers. 

Khalil hopes to expand his business more in the future to increase his income and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to increase his merchandise with new items and products requested by his customers

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en:
Rosemary is a widowed woman. She has three children. She describes herself as ambitious. 

She operates a dairy farm where she sells milk and manure. She has been involved in this business for 10 years. Her primary customers are regular. She describes her biggest business challenge as insufficient working capital. 

She will use the KES 30,000 loan to renovate the roof of the cow shed. Her business goal is to be able to supply milk to supermarkets within five years. 

She hopes that, in the future, she will be able to meet her family's financial needs. This is her fifth loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. The previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to renovate the roof of the cow shed

loans.name: Luz Mary

texts.es:
Luz Mary es una emprendedora de 46 años de edad, le gusta el trabajo independiente y generar sus propios recursos a través de sus habilidades manuales para realizar calzado.

En su empresa genera un empleo, tiene un círculo de ventas estático el cual no puede aumentar debido a la falta de capital.

Inicio su propio negocio con un objetivo de mejorar las condiciones de vivienda, pues cuando tenía un salario ordinario en ocasiones no le alcanzaba para suplir sus necesidades Básicas.

Ella quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de materia prima, cuero, cuerina, suelas, entre otros insumos para la elaboración de calzado.
Este préstamo le permitirá aumentar su producción, rompiendo esa barrera que antes tenía de producir solo un determinado número de zapatos.

El aumento le serviría para abrirse a más mercados y hacer que su marca llegue  más rincones.
texts.en:
Luz Mary is an enterprising 46 year-old woman who enjoys working independently and generating her own income through her ability to make hand-crafted shoes.  

She has a company with an employeee, but her sales have been static due to a lack of capital.  She started her own business with the goal of improving her living conditions, because when she worked in a salaried job there were times when she didn't make enough money to cover her basic needs.

Luz Mary wants to request a loan to buy raw materials such as leather, imitation leather, soles, and other supplies to make shoes.  This loan will allow her to increase her production, breaking the barrier that she had before when she could only produce a certain number of shoes.  This increase will enable her to sell in more markets, so that her brand is seen in more areas.

loans.use: to buy raw  materials to make shoes

loans.name: Carmen Beatriz

texts.es:
Ella es Carmen es una empresaria de 50 años de edad que se dedica a la fabricación de límpido que es un líquido algo fuerte para desinfectar, muy usado en los hogares para lavar baños y cocinas.

Ella es casada tiene tres hijos, sueña con que su profesión florezca y poder tener una distribuidora, todo su proceso es manual, en el lugar de la foto es donde sucede todo el proceso, tiene sus tanques para mezclar el producto y la formula. 

Carmen sueña con dejar el negocio a sus hijos, y ale anda enseñando al mayor todo el proceso para que continúe con la empresa que años atrás fundo.

Ahora Carmen quiere mejorar su ventas, aumentar sus clientes, incrementar sus ganancias, optimizar su operación, tener sostenibilidad, ser más competitiva en el mercado, mejorar el aspecto del negocio, para lograr estos objetivos deben aumentar su producción y por ello se encuentra solicitando un préstamo el cual invertirá en la compra de químicos para fabricar el líquido y el resto del capital lo invertirá en envases.
texts.en:
Carmen is a  50 year-old businesswoman who has a business making "límpido," a strong liquid disinfectant used in homes to clean bathrooms and kitchens.  

She is married and has 3 children.  She dreams of seeing her business flourish and being able to have a distributor.  Her production process is manual; the place in the photo is where she makes her products.  She has tanks where she mixes the product according to the formula.

Carmen dreams of being able to leave her business to her children.  She is teaching the oldest child all of the process so that he can continue with the business that was founded years ago.

At this time, Carmen wants to increase her sales, expand her clientele, increase her earnings, optimize her operation, and have an improved,  sustainable business that is more competitive in the market.  To achieve these goals she must increase her production.  This is why she is requesting a loan to invest in chemicals to make the liquid.  She will invest the rest of the money in packaging.

loans.use: to buy supplies to manufacture her product

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy barley seeds and seed potatoes, as well as fuel to cultivate her land and grow organic produce

loans.name: Asylgul

texts.ru: Асылгул, 34 года, замужем, мать 2 дочерей- школьниц, образование у Асылгул средне-специальное, занимается животноводством и полеводством. Асылгул добилась хороших результатов, у нее есть лошадь и 3 коровы. Также 4,0 ГА поливной земли, она выращивает кукурузу и ячмень. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Асылгул обратилась в Банк «Бай - Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы для увеличения объемов реализации экологически-чистого молока. На прибыль от кредита Асылгул планирует увеличить своё хозяйство.
texts.en:
Asylgul is 34 and married with two school-aged daughters. She has a specialist secondary education and works in animal husbandry and agriculture. She has achieved good results and now has a horse and three cows as well as 4 hectares of land where she grows corn and barley. Her monthly income is about 10,000 KGS.

In order to further develop her business, Asylgul has approached Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 KGS to purchase a dairy cow to increase her volume of organic milk sales. She plans to use profits from the loan to improve her farm.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow in order to increase her volume of organic milk sales

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es:
Guillermo un hombre de 49 años de edad que se dedica a vender bolsos, morrales en una chaza que tiene ubicada en el centro de la ciudad de Medellín, es padre de tres hijos ya mayores de edad, fundó su negocio pro necesidad económica ante la falta de oportunidades para emplearse.

Guillermo trabaja por una ambición la cual es comprar una vivienda propia, para ello tiene pensando para finales del otro año tener otro puesto de venta para aumentar sus ganancias.


De momento Guillermo se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de surtido de Bolsos y morrales estudiantiles, de viaje y ocasionales, pero porque apoyar a este empresario?, al prestarle estas incentivando el emprendimiento, apoyando a familias humildes, e indirectamente creando empleo a muchos colombianos artesanos que fabrican los bolsos de los cuales Guillermo se surte.
texts.en:
Guillermo is a 49-year-old man who sells purses and backpacks from a street stand located in the central part of the city of Medellín. He is the father of three grown children. Guillermo started his business out of financial necessity due to the lack of job opportunities.

He works with the intent of being able to purchase his own home. Within another year, he hopes to open another retail stand so that he can increase his earnings.

At the moment, Guillermo is requesting a loan in order to buy a supply of purses and school backpacks that can be used for travel or casual use. In order to support businesspeople like him, they need to be provided with incentives for entrepreneurship so that they can support their humble families and indirectly create jobs for many Colombian artisans who manufacture the bags that Guillermo sells.

loans.use: to buy purses and backpacks to sell.

loans.name: Saboat

texts.ru: Сабоату 45 лет, она проживает в городке под названием Сарбанд. У Сабоат  есть не большая семья. Муж находится на заработках загранице. Она в течение несколько лет занимается шитьем женской одежды в национальном стиле. Сабоат также на некоторых платьях сама делает вышивки. В месяц она может сшить даже 20 платья. Сабоат прекрасно справляется со своей работой и количество клиентов постепенно возрастают. Сабоат обратилась за кредитом, потому что ей необходимо поменять швейную машинку, потому она уже не рабочем состояние, и прослужила очень долгое время. Новая швейная машинка стоит дорого, чтобы ее купить Сабоату потребуется не большое количество денег. Она решила собрать не достающую сумму денег за счет кредита.
texts.en:
Saboat is 45 and lives in a city called Sarband. She has a small family. Her husband is working abroad and she has been working sewing women's clothing in the traditional style for several years. She also does embroidery on some of the dresses she makes. In a month she can sew up to 20 dresses. She does very well in her work and her number of customers is gradually growing. 

Saboat is looking for a loan because she needs to get a new sewing machine. Her current one isn't working anymore after many years of service. A new sewing machine is quite expensive so to buy one she needs some money. She has decided to use a loan to cover the cost.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Alena

texts.ru: Алена, 26 лет, замужем, есть дочь. У Алены - высшее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, занимается торговлей женской одеждой и нижним бельем в одном из торговых центров города. Благодаря упорному труду Алены, в ее бизнес на сегодняшний день есть товар на сумму около 140,000 сом (KGS). Ежемесячная прибыль составляет - 11,800 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Алена обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на расширение ассортимента товара в ее магазине. Доходы от кредита Алена планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса. Также она мечтает накопить на покупку автомобиля.
texts.en:
Alena is 26 and married with one daughter. She has a higher education and works in retail as the primary source of income for her family, selling women's clothing and lingerie in one of the city retail centres. Thanks to her hard work, her business currently has about 140,000 KGS worth of inventory and her monthly income is 11,800 KGS.

With the goal of further developing her business, Alena has approached Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 KGS to expand the assortment of inventory in her shop. She plans to put profits from the loan into further developing her business, and also dreams of saving toward buying a car.

loans.use: to buy women's clothes for resale in order to increase the assortment of inventory in her shop

loans.name: Maureen

texts.en:
Maureen is married with three children; all of them attend school. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees.

For the past seven years, she has operated a cosmetics shop business, her potential customers being town dwellers and neighbours especially women. She dreams of expanding her business to meet her family's basic needs.

With the loan that she is requesting, she wants to purchase perfumes, lipsticks and body lotions. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, lipsticks and body lotions

loans.name: Maria Doris

texts.es:
María es una empresaria de 62 años de edad, ella se dedica a atender un restaurante que con mucho esfuerzo, tiempo, ahorros, noches de trasnochos fundo, adecuando un local con apenas condiciones mínimas para brindar un servicio puesto que con el capital que contaba no podía hacer nada más.

Inicio hace no más de un año en el momento es quien se encarga de cocinar, de atender y recibir dinero, una tarea complicada pero sus ganancias apenas si bastan para mantener el negocio y los gastos propios de su vivienda.

El sueño de María con su restaurante es que este sea lo suficiente rentable y sostenible para meterse en una deuda a 12 años para comprar una vivienda propia que es su gran sueño, por ello trabaja con tanto empeño, energía y alegría pues quiere cumplir su sueño.

María solicita un préstamo para realizar adecuaciones al local, como lo son pintura, baldosa, remodelar su cocina, comprar cajoneras, mesas, sillas, manteles.
texts.en:
María is a 62-year-old business owner who has a restaurant. With a lot of effort, time, savings, and sleepless nights, she set up a restaurant that had only the minimum requirements in order to provide services because with the money she had, she couldn't do anything more. She opened it no more than a year ago. At the moment, she is the one who is in charge of cooking, serving, and receiving the money, which is a complicated task. María earns just enough to maintain her business and pay for household expenses.

María's dream for her restaurant is that it be profitable and sustainable enough to get a 12-year mortgage to buy her own house, which is her greatest dream. That is why she works with such determination, energy, and joy because she wants to fulfill her dream.

María is requesting a loan to make improvements to her restaurant, such as painting, tiling, remodeling the kitchen, and buying drawers, tables, chairs, and tablecloths.

loans.use: to make improvements to her restaurant, such as painting, tiling, remodeling the kitchen, and buying drawers, tables, chairs, and tablecloths.

loans.name: Sokly

texts.en:
Sokly is a 21-year-old and single.  She is from the Prey Veng Province in Cambodia.  She has worked at a company in the city since 2014, earning an income of 2.6 USD per day. 

Currently, Sokly is pursuing a bachelors degree in accounting at a university in the city.  Due to the fact that she is short of the finances to pay her fourth-year tuition fees, she would like to apply for a loan.  This is her second loan cycle with Kiva.  With this loan, she will have enough finances to cover her fourth-year university fees and complete the year successfully.

Sokly dreams of finding a better job with a reasonable salary, and she also wants to save money to build her own house in the city.

loans.use: to pay her fourth-year tuition fees.

loans.name: Sabahat

texts.en:
Sabahat is married and a mother of three. After raising her children, she started having financial problems. Since she lives in a tourist area, she makes jewellery and sells it to tourists. She used her two previous loans to purchase materials for making jewellery. With the help of her third loan, she wants to increase her sales by purchasing more materials for making jewellery.

Translated from Turkish by Maya staff

Sabahat hanım evli üç çocuk annesi, çocuklarını büyüttükten sonra maddi açıdan sıkıntı çekmeye başlamış. Turizm yönünden gelişmiş bir semtte oturduğundan, takı yapıp satarak aile ekonomisine katkı sağlıyor. İki kez mikro kredi kullanarak takı malzemeleri alıp üretip satış yaptı. Üçüncü kredisini kullanan Sabahat hanım tekrar takı malzemesi alıp üretimine devam edip satışını artırmak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy materials for making jewellery

loans.name: Yeimy Andrea

texts.es:
Yeimy es una empresaria de 30 años de edad que uso su casa como negocio, no contaba con mucho capital, presto dinero y compro un horno para elaborar productos de panadería, ahora lleva 10 años en el negocio genera un empleo y estabilidad a su hogar.

Junto con el negocio llegaran excelentes noticias, se convirtió en madre tiene una pequeña de 7 y un bebe de tan solo 3 añitos, su educación y crianza ahora es su prioridad y un motivo para salir adelante y buscar que su empresa sea la mejor entre la competencia, para cumplir un deseo que a seguido desde que se fue a vivir con su pareja y es comprar una vivienda propia, podrá todo su empeño en lograrlo.

Yeimy quiere solicitar un préstamo para compra de materia prima para elaboración de productos de panadería y realizar un mantenimiento a su horno que luego de 10 años nunca le ha hecho por falta de capital y ya está presentando fallas, como aumento de calor y fallas con el reloj.
texts.en:
Yeimy is a 30-year-old entrepreneur who set up business in her home. She didn't have much capital so she borrowed money and bought an oven to make baked goods. She has now been running the business for ten years; it gives her employment and provides stability at home. 

Along with the business, there has been excellent news as Yeimy became a mother: she has a little girl of seven years old and a baby who is only three. Their education and upbringing is now her priority. It is also a reason to get ahead and try and make her business the best among the competition, in order to fulfill her wish, since going to live with her partner, of buying a home. She is going to put all her efforts into achieving this. 

Yeimy is requesting a loan to buy the ingredients for baked goods and have her oven serviced. In ten years she has never had it serviced, due to lack of capital, and it is now presenting faults such as increased heat and problems with the timer.

loans.use: to buy the ingredients for baked goods and have her oven serviced

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es:
Angélica es una mujer de 28 años de edad, inicio en el año 2013 un negocio de alquiler de videojuegos, un negocio que inicio por necesidad económica y opto por los servicios de videojuegos ya que en la zona no había una persona que tuviera una empresa igual o similar, logrando captar buena parte de público más que todo niños, jóvenes y adolescente que disfrutan de un buen rato jugando con sus amigos.

Angélica trabaja 10 horas cada día de la semana lo hace porque con la ayuda de su negocio ha logrado elevar la calidad de vida de su familia, conformada por sus dos hijos de 9 y 7, comen mejor, ha reparado su vivienda tiene un medio para generar ingresos, sus hijos estudian, muchos cambios positivos que ha generado abrir dicho negocio.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de un televisor led de 32 pulgadas y arreglo del cableado eléctrico, los tiene todos regados en el suelo quiere pasarlo para el techo por lo que necesita un electricista para que haga el trabajo
texts.en:
Angélica is a 28-year-old woman. She started a video game rental business in 2013. She started this business out of financial need and chose video games because there wasn't anyone else in the area that had the same or similar business. She managed to attract a good portion of the public, most of all children and teenagers who enjoy a good time playing games with their friends.

Angélica works 10 hours every day of the week. She does it because with the help of her business, she has managed to raise her family's quality of life, which consists of her two children, ages 9 and 7. They eat better, she has done repairs to her home, she has a way to generate income, and her children go to school. Many positive changes have come from opening her business.

Angélica is requesting a loan to buy a 32-inch LED TV and to fix the electrical wiring since it is all scattered on the floor and she wants it to go through the ceiling, so she needs an electrician to do it.

loans.use: to buy a 32-inch LED TV and to fix the electrical wiring since it is all scattered on the floor and she wants it to go through the ceiling, so she needs an electrician.

loans.name: Dilrabo

texts.en:
Dilrabo is a skillful woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1977 and lives in a small town with her family. She is married and has two children.

For more than eight years she has run a tailoring business. She sews traditional women's dresses and has permanent clients. She is appealing to IMON for help for the first time.

She is planning to open her own studio where she could teach her students how to sew. She wants to get a loan to buy sewing machine and necessary items like thread, needles, etc. to continue her activity and teach students. She awaits Kiva lenders' kindness.

loans.use: to buy sewing machine and necessary items like thread, needles, etc. to continue her activity and teach students

loans.name: Celsa

texts.es:
La socio Celsa continua  dedicándose al negocio de venta de pollos y pescados, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia continua vendiendo en uno de los mercados de la zona, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar pollos.
La socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member, Celsa, continues to earn a living in the business of selling chickens and fish. She has spent a long time in this business which is going well for her thanks to the determination that she puts into her business every day. She continues to sell in one of the markets of the area. She is responsible and persevering and in this way she gets her family ahead in life.
She is applying for a loan to buy chickens.
She feels grateful for the loan and is committed to making the repayments.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita has enthusiasm managing her farming activities in Biasong, Lopez Jaena, in the Philippines.  She earns money working at her hobby.  Since she wants to be more productive, Teresita engages in a snack vending business to expand her resources. 

As a microfinance member of PMPC, she diligently pays all her obligations from her earnings.  Teresita hopes to provide her family with safe and comfortable living quarters, so she requested a loan to purchase marine plywood, nails, and sticks to repair her house. 

Teresita wishes to earn more from her business to continuously benefit her family.

loans.use: to purchase marine plywood, nails, and sticks to repair her house.

location.town: Plaridel - Biasong, Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occidenta

loans.name: Gina

texts.en: Gina is a strong-willed woman who pushes her ability when it comes to her piggery business. She is a hands-on businesswoman and mother who never gets tired of working to support her family. Recently, Gina requested a loan to purchase bags of feed and animal vitamins for her growing hogs in order to boost her income. Aside from her project of building additional pig pens, she has thought of adding heads of pigs for commercial sale and plans to work for swine production to expand her business. Someday Gina hopes to open a meat shop in a nearby town.

loans.use: to purchase bags of feed and animal vitamins for her growing hogs in order to boost her income.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more maize to meet the needs of her clients and family.

loans.name: Rojidin

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! This is Rojidin, one of Ruma’s agents. Rojidin lives in Cianjur, located in West Java, around 2 hours and 30 minutes from Jakarta. He owns a stall that sells accessories, stationery items, and mobile airtime credits for his community. He found out about Ruma from Ruma’s sales executive who came to his stall. He decided to join Ruma because he wants to expand his business in technology, as well as give more of a contribution to his community.
 
As the business grows, Rojidin is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the capital to provide more mobile airtime credits to his community. It is important to know that your loan will be very useful to help Rojidin improve his business and accordingly, help his community, which needs access to such services. In the photo, Rojidin is standing in his own stall. He thanks you for your kind support.

loans.use: to give his community better access to communication services by selling mobile airtime credits.

loans.name: Leidy Rosa

texts.es:
Leidy es una joven de 25 años de edad, inicio un negocio de venta de mercancía por necesidad económica buscando generar el sustento para su familia, siempre ele gusto mucho el emprendimiento en el colegio vendía dulces, manillas, mostrando su fascinación pro el comercio. Ahora ella se dedica a la venta de mercancía pro catálogo, un negocio que quiere llevar a otro nivel, pues aspira en algún momento tener un local propio donde venda ropa y accesorios para dama.

Leidy tiene un problema siempre que necesita comprar surtido y es recoger la cartera de sus clientes, algunos no le pagan dejándola comprometida para otro periodo, ahora Leidy están en un dilema parecido pero busca ayuda de un préstamo para comprar surtido de pijamas, dulces, lociones, accesorios que tiene en carpeta, lo bonito de esta ayuda es que con el préstamo su fondo crecerá, podrá tener más capital para un próximo surtido, algo que la llena de motivación y ganas de seguir realizando esta labor donde su hija es la principal beneficiada.
texts.en:
Leidy, 25, started her own business selling merchandise because she needed to generate resources to support her family.  In school she always enjoyed  entrepreneurship,as she used to sell sweets and bracelets, and she demonstrated a fascination with commerce. Now she has a business selling merchandise through a catalog, a business that she wants to take to another level because she hopes at some point to have her own store where she can sell clothing and ladies accessories.

Leidy's constant problem is needing to buy merchandise and collecting from her customers.  Some of them don't pay, tying up her capital for another period.  Right now Leidy has a similar dilemma, so she is seeking a loan to buy pajamas, sweets, lotions, and accessories  to have in the pipeline.  The beauty of this assistance is that with this loan her funds will grow, and she will have more capital available for the next time she needs to stock up.  This fills her with motivation and the desire to continue doing this work, which is for the primary benefit of her daughter.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to construct a shade for his construction supplies to attract more customers for more income gain.

loans.name: Nora Monserrate

texts.es:
Sosote es una parroquia del cantón Rocafuerte,  que se dedica directamente al arte de elaboración de objetos con tagua, (un marfil vegetal que se consigue en las zonas montañosas de Manta y Portoviejo), tras un extenso proceso de pulido y pintado dan vida a más de 10 mil figuras,  también ofrece la muy solicitada longaniza o salchicha de vísceras de cerdo. Estas se veden fritas o como caldo de manguera. Toda esa delicia se prepara en las ollas de barro que surgen en esa zona.
En este lugar vive la señora Nora, tiene 59 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene 5  hijos mayores de edad e independientes. Vive en casa propia.
Doña Nora para  ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar ya que con lo que él hace no alcanza para cubrir los gastos hace 20 años empezó un negocio en su casa, ella prepara comida para eventos sociales y fecha especiales, trabaja de sábados y domingos y en fechas especiales como día de la madre, navidad, etc. Trabaja con la ayuda de sus hijas y de su nuera. Siempre le ha ido muy bien ya que sus clientes la prefieren por la sazón que le pone a sus platos lo que la hace especial.
