Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar víveres, una cocina más grande y utensilios para cocinar (ollas, cucharas etc.)  Está en el Grupo De Crédito hace un año  y le gusta porque el grupo es unido y por todos los beneficios que reciben de la fundación. Su sueño es tener buena salud para seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Sosote is a parish in the Rocafuerte Canton that is directly devoted to the art of creating objects with tagua (vegetable ivory, obtained in the mountainous zones of Manta and Portoviejo), bringing more than 10,000 figurines to life through an extensive process of polishing and painting. It also offers the very much sought after longaniza (savory fresh sausage) and pork andouille. These are sold fried or as tripe soup. All of these delicacies are prepared in the clay pots that come from that zone. 

Señora Nora lives in this place. She is 59 years old and married; a relationship from which she has five children who are older and independent. She lives in her own house.

Doña Nora started a business in her house 20 years ago in order to help her husband with the household expenses, as he could not quite cover them with what he earns.  She prepares food for social events and special occasions. She works Saturdays and Sundays, and on special occasions such as Mother’s Day, Christmas, etc.  She works with the help of her daughters and her daughter-in-law. It has always gone very well for her, as her customers prefer her for the seasoning that she puts into her dishes, which is something that makes her special.

She is going to use this loan to purchase food supplies, a bigger stove, and cooking utensils (pots, spoons, etc.). She has been in the credit group for a year, and she likes it because the group is united, and because of all the benefits that they receive from the foundation. 

Her dream is to have good health in order to continue working.

loans.use: to purchase food supplies, a stove, and cooking utensils.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma, age 52, is from Plaridel, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Emma joined PMPC, and she appreciates the programs and services of the Co-op. The Co-op supported her by providing the capital to start her sari-sari store. Helping the family survive, she never gets tired of tending her little store.

Fortunately, her store is located in a populous neighborhood, and so she makes promising daily sales. Emma keeps on running the store well, even though she faces increased competition from other stores. She believes that with the support of her family to sustain her, they will beat the competition.

Emma is now trying to expand her resources. She decided to engage in chicken and pork barbecue selling for added income. She presented her project proposal to Paglaum MPC to finance the project and has applied for a loan of PHP 7,000 to buy merchandise for her store and to pay for an inventory of chicken and pork meat for her barbecue, to continue putting bread and butter on the table in their home. With her extra income, she wishes to live a happy and comfortable life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store and to pay for an inventory of chicken and pork meat for her barbecue business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizer so as to increase soil nutrients for better farm produce and to meet both client and family needs.

loans.name: Gibson

texts.en:
Gibson is a married man with four children. He operates a retail business where he sells fruits and vegetables. He has been involved in this business for 15 years.

His business is located in an area that is conducive to selling, and his primary customers are regular. He says that his biggest business challenge is storage.

This is Gibson's first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. He will use the KES 30,000 to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell. He hopes to have a better life in the future.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Zehra

texts.en:
Zehra is married and a mother of two. She is in the meerschaum business with her husband. They had done this for fifteen years in their village. Later on, they moved to a touristic city and made money by selling their products to tourists.

She used microcredit two times. She bought raw meerschaum stone, made her products, and gained money and expanded her business. With the help of her third loan, she is planning to purchase raw meerschaum in bulk.

Translated from Turkish by Maya staff

Zehra hanım evli iki çocuk annesi. Lületaşı işini eşi ile beraber yapıyor. On beş yıldır köyde yaptığı işi turizmin hareketlendiği şehre taşıyor ve turistlere satış yaparak para kazanıyor. İki kez mikro kredi kullandı. Lüle taşını ham olarak aldı üretti ve satarak hem işini geliştirdi ham de para kazandı. Üçüncü kredi ile de lüle taşını ham olarak alıp üreterek para kazanmak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy materials for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farm tools such as jembes for farming her farm and fertilizers for top-dressing her crops, so as to get better produce and meet both client and family needs.

loans.name: Fridah

texts.en:
Fridah is a married woman. She has two children. She describes herself to be determined.

She operates a butchery where she sells meat. She has been involved in this business for ten years. Her business is located in a busy area, and her primary customers are regular. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of enough space in the butchery. She will use the KES 100,000 loan to renovate the butchery shop.

Her business goal is to own a big butchery within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will have improved living standards. This is her third loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Her previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to renovate the butchery shop.

loans.name: Momagul

texts.ru: Момагул 51 летняя семейная женщина. У нее один сын и одна дочка. Детям 31 и 21 лет. Сын занимается таксистом в городе. Она из городка Сарбанд. Момагул начинающая бизнес-леди. У нее есть точка торговля. Она хочет открыть свой магазин по продаже продуктов питания. Ее отец раньше занимался этой видом бизнеса. Момагул решила продвигать деятельность отца, и она знает, что это правильный выбор ее магазин отданная на хранения его отца. Для старта бизнеса, ей необходимо перевозить продуктов питания на продажу. Но у нее нет такая сумма денег для перевоза средств. Момагул с большими надеждами обратилась к Вам за кредитом. Она верит в Вас и на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Momagul is a 51 year old married woman. She has a son and a daughter, ages 31 and 21. Her son is a taxi driver in the city. She is from the town of Sarband. Momagul is starting out as a businesswoman. She has a location and wants to open a grocery store. Her father used to have this kind of business. Momagul decided to continue her father’s work and she knows it is the right decision. In order to start her business she needs to bring in grocery products to sell, but she does not have enough money. Momagul applied for a loan with high hopes. She is counting on your support.

loans.use: to start a new business and bring in grocery products

loans.name: Mousa Group

texts.en:
Riham is the featured borrower for Mousa Group. She applied with other group members for an Al Majmoua loan because they have always been neighbors and friends. They work hard to develop their businesses.

Riham is a 28-year-old engaged woman who has been employed for two years  in a shop to cover her needs and expenses. She is an ambitious and hard-working woman who is helping her fiance to build their future together. 

She is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to prepare for her wedding and buy necessary items. This loan will help Riham organize her wedding day as she has always dreamed. Riham is shown in the photograph sitting in the middle.

Fatima is the first on the left, and Hawraa is on the right of the photo.

loans.use: to prepare for her wedding and buy necessary items.

loans.name: Saidabibi

texts.en:
Saidabibi is a shy woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in a family of workers. She is living in a small town with her family. She is divorced and has one child.

She started her business in 2010. She buys and sells kids’ wear. She knows her activity well and has permanent clients each week. She is a kind, communicative, and honest person.

She is planning to widen her assortment of goods. She asked for help from IMON and Kiva lenders to buy a new assortment of kids’ clothing for sale. She awaits Kiva lenders’ kindness and hopes to be supported. She is responsible to ensure and grow her child.

loans.use: to buy a new assortment of kids' clothing for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to lease more land.

loans.name: Jurabek

texts.ru:
Джурабек молодой мужчина 30 лет, женат, счастливые отец двоих детей. Джурабек учился на инженера, но после окончания университета не смог найти работу. В свои 19 лет он уже был женат и понимал, что времени искать работу у него нет, потому что скоро у него уже будет ребенок. И он решил заняться животноводством. Он начал с 2х коров и 5 баранов. Сейчас у него в стаде больше 15 баранов и пяти коров. Дела идут хорошо. Он откармливает баранов и продает их. Его жена помогает в его делах. Она кормит скот, моет, доит коров.
Джурабек хоть и не смог работать по своей профессии, не жалуется на свою жизнь. Хотя ему приходится тяжело, так как он один кормилец в доме. Сейчас Джурабек хочет купить корм для скота, но у него нет полной суммы денег. Поэтому он обратился в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой. Джурабек надеется на помощь и поддержку.
texts.en:
Jurabek is a young man of 30 years. He is married and the happy father of two children. Jurabek studied to be an engineer, but after finishing his education he was not able to find work. At 19 he was already married, and understood that he didn't have the time to look for a job as he would soon have a child. Therefore he decided to work with livestock breeding. He started with two cows and five rams. 

Jurabek currently  has a herd of more than 15 rams and five cows. His business is going well. He breeds the rams and sells them. His wife helps him with his business. She feeds the cattle, washes and milks the cows. Even if Jurabek could not work with his profession, he does not feel sad about his life, even if he has a tough time as the only breadwinner in the family. 

Currently Jurabek would like to purchase livestock feed, but he does not have the full amount of money needed. Therefore he turned to MDO Arvand for a financial support. Jurabek hopes for help and support.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed

loans.name: Gulgaky

texts.ru: Гулгакы, 42 года, замужем, мать 5 детей. У Гулгакы - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 20 лет назад. Благодаря упорному труду Гулгакы, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 3 коровы, 30 овец, а на участке, мерою 1,0 ГА она выращивает органичный картофель для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гулгакы обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений для обработки почвы. Доходы от кредита Гулгакы планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Gulgaky is 42, married, and a mother of five. She has a high school education and earns the main income for her family by raising livestock and planting crops, which she started doing twenty years ago. Thanks to her hard work, she currently has three cows, thirty sheep, and a 1.0 hectare plot of land where she grows organic potatoes to consume on the farm and to sell. In order to expand her business, Gulgaky applied for a loan of 40,000 som (KGS) with Bai-Tushum Bank to buy fertilizers to treat the land. She plans to use the earnings from the loan to invest in the future expansion of her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers in order to grow organic potatoes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, so as to improve soil fertility on her farm for better produce for family use.

loans.name: Zachariah

texts.en:
Zachariah is a 29-year-old farmer who supports 4 children. 

He has  farmed for  2 years and earns 10,000 KES per month. 

He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to purchase fertilizer to improve his harvest .

He plans to use gained profits to repay the loan and start a retail shop.

His hope is to be financially stable and expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy jerry,yarn, wheat, butter, sugar, and vegetables.

loans.name: Zipporah

texts.en:
Zipporah a 48-year-old married woman who supports 4 children. 

She has operated a retail business for 10 years and earns 4,000 KES per month. 

She has applied for her first loan from VisionFund Kenya to purchase soft drinks.

She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and expand her business. 

Her future hope is to better her life.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks.

loans.name: Shahodat

texts.ru: Шаходат женщина 40 лет, замужем, мать двоих детей. Шаходат выросла в кишлаке, после окончания школы её выдали замуж. Её муж занимается строительством. Первое время все было хорошо, но вскоре после рождения ребенка стало сложно прокормить семью. Поэтому Шаходат решила заняться животноводством, а именно,к упле-продажей домашнего скота. Сейчас у неё в стаде 5 коров, она с четырех утра на ногах, доит коров, относит молоко на рынок. Дела у Шаходат идут хорошо, она не жалуется. Недавно Шаходат продала одну корову, на выручку Шаходат хочет купить двух телят и корм для скота. Но ей не хватает денег. Поэтому она обратилась в МДО Арванд за получением кредита. Шаходат надеется на помощь. Благодарит за поддержку.
texts.en:
Shahodat is a woman of 40 years. She is married and the mother of two children. Shahodat grew up in a kishlak settlement. After finishing school she got married. Her husband is a builder. The first period everything went well, but soon after Shahodat gave birth to their first child, it became difficult to feed the family. Therefore Shahodat decided to start working with livestock breeding, specifically animal sales. 

Currently Shahodat has five cows in her herd. She is on her feet from four in the morning, milking the cows and bringing the milk to the market. Shahodat's business is going well and she does not complain. 

Not long ago Shahodat sold a cow, and for the revenue from this she would like to purchase two calves and livestock feed. However she does not have enough money. Therefore she turned to MDO Arvand to get a loan. Shahodat hopes for help. She thanks for the support.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Solmaz

texts.en:
Solmaz is a married woman with two children who worked as a obstetrician's nurse. She is retired. Her son is going to school and her pension is not enough to support the family budget so she started making hand-made jewelry. 

She used the first loan to purchase materials, expand the business, and save money. She will use the  second loan  to  make more jewelry and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials to make jewelry.

loans.name: Harrison

texts.en:
Harrison is married, has two children and describes himself as determined. For the past seven years he has operated a business where he transports customers using his tuk tuk, or three-wheeled taxi. He is in a busy area where he has regular customers. His biggest business challenge is insufficient working capital.

Harrison is applying for a 15,000 KES loan through Kiva's field partner SMEP Microfinance Bank to buy spare parts for his tuk tuk. His goal is to own two tuk tuks within five years.

Harrison is working to educate his children and improve his family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his tuk tuk

loans.name: Dalerjon

texts.ru: Далерчон трудолюбивый и ответственный мужчина. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. Далерчон живёт и работает таксистом  городе. Поэтому Далерчон самостоятельно занимается делом, которое приносит ему доход. Дети Далерчона учатся в школе, и для этого также нужны денежные средства, чтобы обеспечивать своих детей всем необходимым для учёбы. И таким образом, для того, чтобы иметь хороший и стабильный доход на проживание Далерчон занимается своим бизнесом. Вот уже как несколько лет он работает таксистом. У него имеется для этого собственная легковая машина. Но эта машина служит ему уже долгое время и много раз приходилось её чинить. Поэтому сейчас он планирует купить новую, более улучшенную машину для ведения и расширения своего бизнеса. Этот бизнес приносит Далерчону хороший доход, но его хватает только на проживание и обучение детей. А для того, чтобы купить новую машину требуются денежные средства. Поэтому Далерчон обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку машины для ведения и расширения своего бизнеса. Он очень благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Dalerjon is a hardworking and responsible man. He is married and has two children. Dalerjon lives and works as a taxi driver in the city. He has an independent business which brings him income. Dalerjon's children go to school, and he also needs money for this, to provide his children with everything necessary for studying. This is why Dalerjon has his own business: To have a good and stable income. 

Dalerjon has already worked as a taxi driver for several years. He has his own vehicle for this. This vehicle has served him for a long time and he has had it repaired many times. Therefore he currently plans to purchase a new and better vehicle to conduct and expand his business. 

The business brings Dalerjon a good income, but it is only enough for living and educating his children. So in order to purchase a new vehicle he needs money. Therefore he turned to MDO Arvand and would like to get a loan for purchasing a vehicle to conduct and expand his business. He thanks Arvand very much for the support.

loans.use: to purchase a new vehicle

loans.name: Dustmuhammad

texts.ru: Это парень Дустмухаммад. Ему 26 лет. Он житель района Чиликул. Дустмухаммад женатый.Он на районе живет вместе отцом, матерью, сестрой и женой. Его семья занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью.  Сам Дустмухаммад в районе занимается выращиванием крупнорогатого скота. Уже 5 лет он занимается этой деятельности. Дустмухаммад уверень в себе и хорошо справляется с работой. Он решил расширить животноводческую деятельность, путем увеличения поголовье скота. Для увеличения поголовье скота ему нужен определенная сумма денег, и он обратилась за кредитом. Дустмухаммад заранее выражает свою благодарность.
texts.en:
This is Dustmuhammad. He is 26 years old. He is a resident of the Jilikul region. Dustmuhammad is married. He lives in the region together with his father, mother, sisters and wife. He works with agriculture. Dustmuhammad works with cattle breeding. He has had this business for five years already. 

Dustmuhammad believes in himself and deals well with his business. He decided to expand his cattle breeding business through increasing the number of cattle. To increase the number of cattle he needs a certain amount of money and therefore he applied for a loan. Dustmuhammad thanks you in advance.

loans.use: to expand his cattle breeding business through purchasing cattle

loans.name: Semiha

texts.en:
Semiha is a housewife and mother of two. After her husband's death she started selling her handmade knits and handicrafts to earn an income.

With the help of her first loan from Kiva's field partner Maya, Semiha purchased thread in bulk and knitted infant wear to sell. She increased her offerings using the profits from that loan. With this second loan of 600 TRY she is planning to buy more thread and materials for jewelry, increase her sales and so earn more money.

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

Semiha hanım iki çocuk annesi eşi vefat ettikten sonra ev kadını iken yaptığı elişi ve örgüleri satışa sunmaya başlamış ve para kazanmış, ailesinin geçimini sağlamış. Aldığı kredi ile örgü ipi alarak bebek ürünleri üretmiş ve satarak işini geliştirmiş. ikinci çektiği kredi ile örgü ipi ve takı malzemesi alarak üreterek satışlarını artırmayı ve işini geliştirmeyi hedefliyor.

loans.use: to buy more thread and materials with which to make jewelry

loans.name: Ryan

texts.en:
Ryan is a Ruma agent who lives in West Java, which is 2 hours and 30 minutes from Jakarta. He has a son and is happily married. Ryan owns a stall that sells mobile airtime credits and provides mobile payment services for his community.

He has been with Ruma for a year and heard about the group from a Ruma sales executive.. He decided to join Ruma because of their good service. Ryan is a friendly and hardworking person and his community sees him as a trusted and informative mobile provider.

Ryan will use the capital to provide more mobile airtime credits to his community. Your loan will  help Ryan improve his business and community who needs access. He thanks you for your kind support.

loans.use: to purchase mobile airtime credits.

loans.name: Khadicha

texts.ru:
Хадиче 39 лет. Она проживает в районе Чиликул. Хадича мать троих детей. Дети учатся в школе. Ее муж занимается ремонтом домов. Хадича вместе мужем и детьми живет в селе. Она занимается в родном районе животноводством. Ей в работе помогает старший сын. Она много лет своей жизни занимается этой деятельностью. Хадича  любит домашних животных, по этой причине она занимает животноводством. Ей в деятельности нравится доить коров и обеспечивать семью молоком и молочными продуктами. Хадича еще и занимается растениеводством. У нее имеется не большой земельный участок во дворе. Она берет кредит, чтобы  купить несколько голов скота и расширить деятельность. В будущем за счет дохода от животноводства Хадича планирует расширить свой бизнес по продаже овощей. 
Вы можете помочь ей сейчас!
texts.en:
Khadicha is 39 years old. She lives in the Jilikul region. Khadicha is the mother of three children. Her children go to school. Her husband works with renovating houses. 

Khadicha, her husband and her children live in a small village. She works with livestock breeding in her native region. Her eldest son helps her with the work. She has been in this business for many years of her life. Khadicha loves livestock and for this reason she works with livestock breeding. She likes to milk cows and provide her family with milk and dairy products. 

Khadicha also works with field crop cultivation. She has a small plot of land in her yard. She takes a loan in order to purchase some livestock and expand her business. Based on the income from this loan, she plans to in the future expand her business through selling vegetables. You can help her now!

loans.use: to purchase some livestock and expand her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock such as cooking oil and sugar to sell

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily wants to help her family and grandchildren and has operated a sari-sari store to earn and save money. She requests 13,00 PHP  to improve the enterprise and buy merchandise to sell. 

Thank you in advance for your generosity and heartfelt concern for people. 

She meets weekly with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and draws strength and inspiration from the Word of God.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
KIVA lenders have been a great help to Yolanda. She used a recent loan to meet the daily expenses of her household and develop her business (sari-sari store).   

She would like to take another  a loan to buy additional products. You have once proved to her that God has been faithful in her life. She believes that you would help her again. 

Someday, she hopes for a better life for her children. She prays that they will be able to finish their schooling and that her business will grow and expand. 

Vivian meets weekly with her fellowship group* to share stories of her life and business and draws strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy  grocery products.

loans.name: Zainura

texts.ru: Зайнура молодая девушка в возрасте 27 лет проживающая в сельской местности. Она замужем и имеет двоих детей. В селе Зайнура имеет продуктовый магазин, который она открыла своими силами, чтобы хоть как то помочь мужу обеспечивать семью. Постепенно она смогла расширить свой товарооборот и увеличить прибыль. Сейчас прибыль с магазина является основным источником дохода для ее семьи. Муж Зайнуры работает водителем такси на своей машине. Весь свой заработок он тратит на свою семью и только благодаря своей жене они в состоянии обеспечивать свою семью. Недавно Зайнура сделала ремонт в доме,  это увеличило ее расходы. На данный момент Зайнура испытывает финансовые проблемы и у нее не хватает денег,  чтобы закупить товар для магазина. С этой проблемой она решила обратится в «АРВАНД» за поддержкой. На полученные деньги Зайнура хочет увеличить свой товарооборот.
texts.en:
Zainura is a young woman at the age of 27, living in a rural village. She is married and has two children. 

Zainura has a grocery store in the village, which she opened by herself in order to help her husband provide for the family. She expanded her turnover and income step by step. Currently the income from the store is the main source of income for her family. Zainura's husband works as a taxi driver and has his own vehicle. He spends all his income on the family and only thanks to his wife they are able to provide for it. 

Not long ago, Zainura renovated her house which increased the family's expenses. Currently Zainura is experiencing financial problems and she does not have enough money to purchase goods for the store. Due to this problem she decided to turn to MDO Arvand for support. She would like to use the money received to increase her turnover.

loans.use: to purchase goods and increase her turnover

loans.name: Tom

texts.en:
Tom is a 36-year-old married man with 5 children. He has had a motorcycle transportation business for 5 years. He will  use the loan to buy spare parts to repair and service his motorcycle and keep it in good condition so that he can serve more customers. 

He plans to use the anticipated profits to educate his children. His future hopes and dreams are to buy another motorcycle.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to repair and service his motorcycle.

loans.name: Frank

texts.en:
Frank is a 27-year-old married man who supports a family of 2 children. 

He has operated a cybercafe for 3 years earns 18,000 KES per month. 

Frank has applied for his first loan of 25,000 KES from VisionFund Kenya to buy a refrigerator to store soft drinks. 

He plans to use the anticipated profits to start a retail shop. 

His future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator for soft drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow..

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria believes that poverty is never a hindrance to reach your dreams. If you are determined, you'll be unstoppable. 

She has operated a sari-sari  for years  and received financial assistance because of her eagerness to improve her inventory. It was indeed an accomplishment as she was able to provide a better income for her household. 

She would like a loan of  28,000 PHP  to buy grocery items, toiletries, and beverages.. This can be a great stepping stone for her. She's hopeful and will work hard for her dream which is to have her own stall and educateher dependents. 

She meets weekly with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and  draws strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God.

All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to buy grocery items, toiletries, and beverages.

loans.name: Sayora

texts.ru: Сайёра женщина в возрасте 49 лет проживающая в сельской местности. Сайёра замужем и имеет 4 детей. Сама Сайёра родилась и выросла в селе далеко от города. Как и все жители сел Сайёра занимается животноводством. Этой профессией она начала заниматься с юных лет.  Её отец также занимался животноводством,  и Сайёра унаследовала его профессию. Животноводство в семье у Сайёры является основным источником дохода. На данный момент у Сайёра возникли некоторые финансовые трудности из за понижение цен на скот. Так как Сайёра начала строительство здания она не смогла из за проблем полностью его закончить. С этой проблемой она решила обратиться в «АРВАНД» за поддержкой.  На полученные деньги Сайёра хочет закончить строительство купив и установив пластиковые окна и двери.
texts.en:
Sayora is a woman of the age of 49. She lives in a rural area. Sayora is married and has four children. She was born and grew up in a village far from the city. 

Sayora works with livestock breeding, like all the residents of the village. She started working with this in her young years. Her father also worked with livestock breeding, and Sayora inherited his profession. Livestock breeding is the main income for Sayora's family. 

Currently Sayora is having some financial troubles due to lower livestock prices. She started the construction of a building, but could not finish it due to the troubles. She decided to turn to MDO Arvand for support. For the money received, Sayora would like to finish the building, purchasing and installing plastic windows and doors.

loans.use: to purchase and install plastic windows and doors

loans.name: Nargis

texts.en: Nargis is a hospitable woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1981. She is living in a small town with her family. She is married and has four children. Her husband is an entrepreneur. She has a grocery store business where she sells candies, dish detergent, soap, bread, fruits and vegetable, etc. The beginning of her activity was at her house. She sold grocery products at home, then widened her business and opened a small store in a domestic market. She appealed to IMON asking for financial support from Kiva and IMON to buy grocery products. She awaits Kiva lenders' kindness.

loans.use: to buy grocery products

loans.name: Anggi

texts.en:
Anggi is a Ruma agent who lives in Majalengka which is  located in West Java which is  a 5 hour drive from Jakarta, the capital city of Indonesia. 

He is happily married and owns a stall to sell consumer products and mobile airtime credits. He has been a Ruma member for a year and heard about them from a Ruma’s sales executive that came to his stall. 

Anggi hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva and will use the capital to provide more mobile airtime credits to his community. This loan will be very useful and help Anggi improve his business and provide community members with  access to services.

loans.use: to give his community better access to communication services by selling mobile airtime credits.

loans.name: Shavkatjon

texts.ru: Шавкатчон молодой мужчина в возрасте 33 лет проживающий в сельской местности. Он женат и у него один ребенок. Шавкатчон родился и вырос в селе. Окончив школу он занялся бизнесом, стал покупать молодых теленочков, откормив продавал за большую цену. Благодаря своему бизнесу он смог жениться и построить дом. Постепенно Шавкатчон увеличил поголовье своего скота и начал получать больше прибыли. Так как он сам не смог получить достойного образования, он решил что его дети должны иметь возможность получить достойное образование и он все сделает для этого. Сейчас бизнес у Шавкатчона переживает не лучшие времена из-за понижения цен на скот. Ему надо закупить корм для скота но денег у Шавкатчона нет. С этой проблемой он обратился в МДО Арванд за поддержкой. На полученные деньги Шавкатчон хочет купить корм для скота.
texts.en:
Shavkatjon is a young man of the age of 33. He lives in a rural area. He is married and has one child. Shavkatjon was born and grew up in the same village he lives in. After having finished school he started a business, purchasing young calves, and selling them at a higher price after breeding them. 

Thanks to his business, Shavkatjon was able to get married and build a house. Step by step he increased the number of livestock and started to get a higher income. as he was not able to get an education himself, he decided that his children should get the opportunity to get a valuable education and he would do everything to make this happen. 

Currently Shavkatjon's business is experiencing hard times due to a decrease in the price of cattle. He needs to purchase cattle feed, but does not have money for it. With this problem he turned to MDO Arvand for support. He would like to purchase cattle feed for the money received.

loans.use: to purchase cattle feed

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase some calves and lambs in order to help bolster her income

loans.name: Al Kalaa 1 Group

texts.en:
Faten is the featured borrower for Al Kalaa 1 Group. She joined the group to request a loan because they are neighbors and friends who work hard to develop their businesses.

Faten is a 42-year-old married woman with five children. She has had a home-based hairdressing salon for 22 years to help her husband cover the increasing needs and expenses of their family. She is a hard worker and ambitious woman who is developing her business. She requests  a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to buy a tattoo machine and hair dryer to satisfy her customers' special requests. Faten is sitting in the middle of the photo. 

Abir (on the right) is a 38-year-old married woman with four children who sells household items and wants to increase her merchandise. Nivine (on the left) is a 20-year-old single woman who works as a hairdresser and wants to buy Hair dye, make up, and keratin.

loans.use: to buy a tattoo machine and hair dryer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build an artesian well, and remodel her house's bathroom.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is a married mother of four children, all of whom attend school. She lives in her own house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

For the past five years, she has operated a clothes-selling business, selling from door-to-door to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of the high cost of transportation. She dreams of expanding and establishing a boutique business in the future. 

With the loan that she is requesting of Kes 50,000, she wants to purchase bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a fridge for use to meet his customers' demands and to earn more income as well.

loans.name: Nurzhamal

texts.ru: Нуржамал, 47 лет, замужем, есть сын - школьник. У Нуржамал среднее образование. Она по характеру: спокойная, отзывчивая, трудолюбивая. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, уже много лет занимается животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду Нуржамал, в хозяйстве имеется: 5 коров, 30 овец. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Нуржамал обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 4 бычков для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита Нуржамал планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства, а также, в будущем хочет построить дом.
texts.en:
Nurzhamal is 47 years old, married and has a son. He is of school age. Nurzhamal has high school education. By character she is quite, sympathetic and hardworking. 

As a main source of income for her family, Nurzhamal has worked with livestock breeding for many years already. Thanks to her persistent work, the farm currently has five cows and 30 sheep. The monthly income is 15,000 som (KGS).

With an aim to further develop her business, Nurzhamal turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 150,000 som (KGS) to purchase four bull-calves to breed and resell. She plans to invest the income from the loan in further improving her business, and also, in the future, she would like to build a house.

loans.use: to buy four steers for fattening and reselling

loans.name: Siti

texts.en:
Mrs. Siti has a family of three and lives in a town in Malang Regency in Java, Indonesia's most heavily populated island. In Indonesia, you cannot drink city water and most people don't even have access to piped water. Therefore, most Indonesians depend on purchasing or boiling water. Mrs. Siti heard of a new option for disinfecting water when the promotion crew from Nazava Water Filters held safe water training in her vicinity. Nazava Water Filters filter well, rain, and city water so it becomes safe to drink without boiling and without using fuel or electricity. Mrs. Siti, who is also a leader of her neighborhood, seized the opportunity and became the sales representative of Nazava in her area. 

This loan will allow Mrs. Siti to buy 40 filters and sell them on consignment to her neighbors making safe drinking water available to 200 people.

loans.use: To buy water filters in order to provide her neighbors with safe drinking water

loans.name: Jhonatan

texts.es:
Él es Jhonatan  un joven de 24 años de edad, emprendedor, trabajador, que desde muy joven se separó de sus padres para emprender su propio negocio y vida, monto una tienda de productos de la canasta familiar, la cual le ha servido para el mantenimiento de su familia que la conforma su pareja y dos hijos que aún son muy bebes la princesa de 4 y el campeón de 2.

Jhonatan está pagando una casa, es un joven muy aplicado y responsable, ahora quiere mejorar el negocio pues busca una mejor calidad de vida y acabar rápidamente con el dinero que resta del apartamento.

Para mejorar las ventas y atraer más clientes, Jhonatan quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra 	de abarrotes, bebidas, cervezas, aguardiente y ron, un préstamo que ayudara a abastecer su negocio y variar las marcas de productos que usa, dejando en el inventario la más consumidas por sus clientes.
texts.en:
Jhonatan is an enterprising and hard working 24 year old. He has been independent from his parents since he was quite young so he could start his own business and life, opening a basic foods store. It has served to maintain his family which consists of his partner and two children who are still young, a 4 year old princess and a 2 year old champion. Jhonatan is paying for a house. He is a very diligent and responsible youth who now wants to improve his business as he is looking for a better standard of living and to pay off the rest of the money for his apartment quickly.

To improve sales and attract more clients Jhonatan wants to request a loan to buy groceries, drinks, beer, aguardiente (sugar cane liquor) and rum. A loan will help him to stock his business and vary the brands of products he carries, having in his inventory more goods for his clients.

loans.use: to buy groceries, drinks, beer, aguardiente (sugar cane liquor) and rum.

loans.name: Dewi

texts.en:
Mrs. Dewi has a family of two and lives in a town in Malang Regency in Java, Indonesia's most heavily populated island. In Indonesia, you cannot drink city water and most people don't even have access to piped water. Therefore, most Indonesians depend on purchasing or boiling water. Mrs. Dewi heard of a new option for disinfecting water when the promotion crew from Nazava Water Filters held safe water training in her vicinity. Nazava Water Filters filter well, rain, and city water so it becomes safe to drink without boiling and without using fuel or electricity. Mrs. Dewi, who is also a health worker in her neighborhood, seized the opportunity and became a sales representative for Nazava in her area. 

Mrs. Dewi will use this loan to buy about 20 filters and sell them to her neighbors on credit, making safe drinking water available to 100 people.

loans.use: To buy water filters in order to provide her neighbors with safe drinking water

loans.name: Ashot

texts.en:
Ashot, 49 years old, lives in the village of Ddmashen in Gegharkunik region with his two sons, their families and his grandchild. 

Ashot is a driver of social transport and he also finds time for farming, the main source of income for his family. His farm has cows, a calf, a heifer, pigs, sheep and chickens. He sells his milk, meat and eggs right from his farm along with his potatoes and tomatoes. After work, Ashot’s elder son helps his father on the farm. 

In order to provide his big family with more income and better living conditions, Ashot greatly hopes for Kiva support in the purchase of another cow for his farm.

loans.use: pay for another cow for his farm

loans.name: Filonila

texts.es:
Filonila, de 65 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, está divorciada, tiene 4 hijos de los cuales tres están casados y viven aparte, solo una hija vive en casa con ella y es quien le ayuda a administrar el negocio y de quien depende economicamente. 

Filonila, es dueña de una tienda desde hace 23 años, decidió hacerlo ya que cuando ella inicio eran pocas las tiendas que habían y le era muy rentable, aparte de eso tiene una tortillería en otro barrio de su pueblo y es una sobrina de ella quien elabora las tortillas.

Filonila, necesita el crédito para comprar arroz, frijoles, azúcar, jabón, detergentes, condimentos, frutas, verduras, papel higiénico, aceite y café.

Filonila, sueña con abrir otra tienda en uno de los cantones de su pueblo a largo plazo.
texts.en:
Filonila, 65 years old, went to school up to the sixth grade. She is divorced and has 4 children, of whom three are married and live on their own; only one daughter lives with her and it is she who helps run the business and who depends on her economically. 

Filonila has been the owner of a store for the past 23 years. She decided to do it since, when she began, there were few stores and it was very profitable. Apart from this, she has a tortilla making business in another neighborhood of her town and it is her niece who makes the tortillas.

Filonila needs the loan to purchase rice, beans, sugar, soap, detergents, seasonings, fruit, vegetables, toilet paper, oil, and coffee. 

Filonila dreams of opening another store in one of the cantons of her town in the long term.

loans.use: to purchase rice, beans, sugar, soap, detergents, seasonings, fruit, vegetables, toilet paper, oil, and coffee for her store.

loans.name: Rashid

texts.en: Rashid is 44 years old, married, and has two children. Rashid has been an IDP (Internally Displaced Person) from Fuzuli city. Now he lives in Fuzuli region with his lovely family. This is Rashid's next loan from Kiva; all his previous loans he paid on time. He has an animal-breeding business. Now he needs a 1,200 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat) loan to buy more calves. For the help, he says he is thankful for the Kiva organization and lenders. In the future, he wants to help his children with their education.

loans.use: to buy more calves to increase his business. In the future, he wants to help his children with their education.

loans.name: Mahdeya

texts.en:
Mahdeya, a 40-year-old married woman from a village near Hebron city, is the mother of four sons. Her husband is a worker earning a low and unstable income, while Mahdeya raises sheep next to her house, selling the meat and diary products in the local market.

Mahdeya has requested a USD loan from FATEN to help her buy more sheep for her farm. This will increase both production and the family's income.

loans.use: to buy more sheep for her farm.

loans.name: Oscar Dario

texts.es:
Sonriente, eufórico, amante a la música, así es Oscar un hombre de 39 años de edad, una persona que gusta mucho de tocar guitarra, vive soltero pero tiene una hija de 12 años por la cual velar.

Su negocio es la tapicería, todo en mueblería tanto para vehículos como par amuebles del hogar, atiende cualquier pedido, ofreciendo calidad, agilidad y buenos precios.

Oscar mira su negocio a 10 años como una tapicería modelo donde se genera empleo, donde los clientes abunden, que sea un almacén gigante, todo pro que en ese periodo de tiempo es donde quiere comprar una casa propia, ya que donde vivía anteriormente pro respeto y responsabilidad la dejo a su expareja para que habitara con la hija.

Oscar solicita un préstamo para la compra de materia prima, como lo es poliuretano para fabricar asientos de vehículos, plástico, tela entre otros.

Este préstamo le dará los insumos para cubrir unos pedidos que le generara buena utilidad para seguir mejorando su calidad de vida y encaminarse a realizar sus sueños.
texts.en:
Smiling, euphoric, a lover of music, that is Oscar a 39 year old man who loves to play guitar. He live alone but has a 12 year old daughter to watch over. His business is upholstery anything to do with furniture be it for a vehicle or furniture for the house. He'll undertake any request, offering quality, flexibility and good prices. With 10 years in the business Oscar looks at it as a model upholstery business which generates employment, has lots of clients and is a large warehouse. At this time he wants to buy his own house as where he lived before he left to his ex-wife out of respect and responsibility who lives there with his daughter.

Oscar is requesting a loan to buy raw material like polyurethane to fabricate vehicle seats, plastic and cloth amongst others. this loan will give him the material to fill a number of orders that will generate good profit to continue to improve his quality of living and put him on the road to realize his dreams.

loans.use: to buy raw material like  polyurethane to fabricate vehicle seats, plastic and cloth amongst others.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To set up a stable shed for her bricks.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 22-year-old single man from the city of Rafah. He works as a salesman in a small electronics store. Ali receives a low income that is not enough to cover all the family's needs. Ali would like to improve his family's living conditions and buy all that they need.

Ali took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a water purification machine for the family house. This will enable him to provide clean water for his family.

Ali appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a water purification machine for the family house.

loans.name: Diah

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! This is Diah, one of Ruma’s agents. Diah lives in Majalengka, located in a regency in West Java, located about a five-hour drive from Jakarta, the capital city of Indonesia. Together with her husband, they have two children. Diah sells mobile airtime credits and provides electricity payment services for her community. Diah joined Ruma a year ago. She learned about Ruma from Ruma’s sales executive who came to her stall. She decided to join Ruma because she wanted to expand her business with technology. Diah is a kind and friendly person and her community sees her as a trusted and informative mobile provider. 

As the business grows, Diah is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. She will use the capital to provide more mobile airtime credits and electricity bill payment services to her community. Having known about the importance, your loan will be very useful to help Diah improve her business and accordingly, her community, who needs access to such services.  As seen in the photo, Diah is the one who is standing. She thanks you for your kind support.

loans.use: to process more prepaid mobile airtime purchases and electricity bill payments  for members of her local community.

loans.name: Siempre Unidos Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SIEMPRE UNIDOS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Laura ella es soltera y tiene 58 años y tiene 1 hijo; La socia trabaja en su negocio de restaurant, la socia es una mujer emprendedora que por medio de este negocio la socia quiere que sus hijos que terminen de estudiar, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant grande. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar pollo, verduras, arroz y carne.
La socia que esta pegada a la foto grupal se le tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de venta de comida, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de artesanía.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: The members belong to the community bank "Siempre Unidos."  This bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the province and department of Cusco. Mrs. Laura is single, she is 58 years old and has one son. She owns a restaurant, she is an entrepreneurial woman who, through this business,  wants to help her children finish school. Her dream is to have a big restaurant. She is asking for a loan to buy chicken, vegetables, rice and beef. The picture of the member shown on the bottom left corner was added to the group picture because she had to ask for permission due to work reasons. The other members work selling clothes, food, in a grocery store and selling artesania (handicraft.) The member thanks those who take part in this dream and promises to meet her installment payments in the agreed time.

loans.use: The member is requesting a loan to buy chicken, vegetables, rice and beef.

loans.name: Tres De Mayo De Simatauca Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “TRES DE MAYO DE SIMATAUCA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Chinchero, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Genara ella es casada y tiene 54 años y tiene 1 hijo; La socia trabaja en su negocio de agricultura, la socia tiene un terreno de cultivo donde siembra maiz,papa y trigo,la socia es una mujer trabajadora y emrpendedora que por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a sus hijos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de agricultura. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de animales, negocio de venta de ganadería, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de animales.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: The members belong to the community bank "Tres de Mayo de Simatauca." This bank is located in Chinchero, in the province of Urubamba, department of Cusco. Mrs. Genara is married, she is 54 years old and has one son. She works in agriculture, she has a piece of land where she grows corn, potatoes, and wheat. She is an entrepreneurial,  hard working woman who through this business, wants to help her children get ahead. She works from 8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m. She already has several year in this business and it is going well. Her dream is to expand her agricultural business. She is asking for a loan to buy seeds and fertilizers. The other members work growing animals, in livestock sales, grocery store and selling animals.  She is grateful to those who make this dream come true and promises to meet her installment payments in the agreed time.

loans.use: Buy seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Millecent

texts.en:
Millecent is a married woman with one child who attends school. She lives at a rental house that has electricity but no piped water. She cites school fees and food as her greatest monthly expenses.

She has operated a beauty salon business for the past three years. Her potential customers are her fellow neighbours and people at the market place. She dreams of earning more income and incorporating of hairdressing skills in the future. 

With the 25,000 KES she wants to purchase chemicals and air conditioners for her beauty salon business. She decided to join Yehu to get financial support to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase chemicals and air conditioners for her beauty salon business.

loans.name: Sahar

texts.en:
Sahar is a 36-year-old married woman from a village near Jenin city. She is a mother for two sons and one daughter. Her husband is a worker, who has a low and unstable income. Sahar works in raising sheep next to her house. She sells the meat and diary products in the local market.

Sahar took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy more sheep for her farm. This will increase the production and also the family income. 

Sahar appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy more sheep for her farm.

loans.name: Abeer

texts.en:
Abeer is a 20-year-old single lady from a village near Hebron city. She lives with her family in a small simple house. Her brother is a worker, but has a low and unstable income. Abeer works in raising sheep next to her house. She sells the meat and diary products in the local market.

Abeer took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy more sheep for her farm. This will increase production and also the family income. 

Abeer appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy more sheep for her farm.

loans.name: Ghazi

texts.en:
Ghazi is a 31-year-old married man from Deir Al-Balah city. He lives with his wife and three sons in a small, humble house.

Ghazi works in the public sector where the salaries are low and unstable. He has taken a USD murabaha-type loan from FATEN to buy a solar panel system. This will help him provide hot water to his home and reduce electricity expenses. Ghazi appears in the photo above.

loans.use: to buy a solar panel system

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow for milk production and sales.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 32-year-old married man from Khan Younis city. He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. He also works selling fruits and vegetables from a stall. It is a good business and provides the family with a good income. 

Ahmad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more fruits and vegetables for his business to resell. By taking this loan, Ahmad will be able to increase his sales and also his income. Ahmad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables for his business to resell

loans.name: Tamim

texts.en:
Tamim is a 31-year-old single man from Deir Al-Balah city. He lives with his family in a small, humble house.

Tamim works as a huckster where he gets a low and unstable income. He has taken a USD Murabaha-type loan from FATEN to buy a solar panel system and water purification machine for the family home. This will help him provide hot and clean water to his home and reduce electricity expenses.

Tamim appears in the photo above.

loans.use: to buy a solar panel system and water purification machine for the family home.

loans.name: Andranik

texts.en: Andranik is a farmer and greatly specialized in beekeeping. He has 50 bee families and each season his bees give honey of different tastes as their are a lot of flowers in this district. They are pure and each in its turn is healing and very useful for the health of man. Andranik sells his farm honey to his long list of regular customers who prefer only his farm’s honey. He also sells the propolis from his farm of which people make medicine. He is happy since he is engaged in an occupation that he enjoys very much. Andranik mentions that his children are very healthy since they use his farm products daily. Andranik has a big family (he has three daughters and two sons) and they all together help each other taking care of their bees which provide for their living. With this Kiva loan amount, Andranik wants to buy 10 more bee families for his farm and develop his farming activities.

loans.use: to buy 10 more bee families for his farm and develop his farming activities.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock of home products for sale to earn more income.

loans.name: Vardan

texts.en: Vardan is a historian with higher professional education. He is very clever and an intellectual person, who besides being deputy director and teacher of Armenian History at the school, writes different historical works. You can see one in the photo of Vardan. The theme of that work is “Armenian Genocide." In his works, there are a lot of details and historical proof, including copies of documents that show the seriousness of the problem. The ‘’genocide’’ took place 100 years ago and it must be recognized all over the world in order to avoid new disasters and human atrocities in any corner of our world. Vardan also gives a private course in Armenian History for the pupils who must have entrance exams. He is married and lives with his wife and two daughters in Vanadzor city of Lori region. With this loan, Vardan wants to buy a new computer and professional literature which are very important tools in his writing works.

loans.use: to buy a new computer and professional literature which are very important tools in his writing work.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow to increase milk supply to clients and meet her daily needs.

loans.name: Larisa

texts.en: Larisa is 45 years old and she lives in Vanadzor city of Lori region. She graduated Vanadzor State Institute studying Elementary Education and Methodology. For 20 years, she has worked at a school. At her house, she also has a group of pupils whom she helps to prepare their lessons and also overcome and understand difficult lessons that they do not manage at the school. She mentions she likes her occupation very much and feels very happy that her pupils have successes in their education. Larisa is married and she lives now with her daughter. Her husband and son are in the Russian Federation working. With this loan of 500,000 AMD, Larisa hopes to buy a computer and also new methodological literature for her teaching activities.

loans.use: to buy a computer and also new methodological literature for her teaching activities.

loans.name: Fadime

texts.en:
Fadime is a mother of three. She has a meerschaum business. She and her husband have been in this business for many years. After her husband died, she continued with the work. With the help of her first loan, she bought raw meerschaum in bulk, made her products, sold them and made money. With the help of her second loan, she is planning to do the same and expand her business.
Translated from Turkish by Maya staff
Fadime hanım evli üç çocuk annesi.  Çocukluğundan beri lüle taşı işi yapıyor.  Eşi birlikte uzun yıllar bu işi yapıyorlar. Eşi vefat edince üç çocukla kalan Fadime hanım çalışmak zorunda olduğundan vazgeçmeyip işine devam ediyor.  İlk kullandığı mikro kredi ile lüle taşını ham alarak işleyerek üretip satıyor para kazanıyor.  İkinci kredisi ile lüle taşını işlenmemiş olarak alıp üretip satarak işini geliştirmeyi hedefliyor.

loans.use: to buy raw meerschaum in bulk.

loans.name: Suna

texts.en:
Suna is married and a mother of two. Suna was in the network business for many years and she finally decided to start her own business. She took surveys in her neighbourhood about the needs that people had and finally decided to open a laundry shop. Most of her customers are university students. With the help of her loans she purchased detergents, softeners and clothes hangers for her laundry shop. In the future, she is planning to expand her business and open a dry cleaning store.  

Translated from Turkish by Maya staff
Suna Hanım evli ve 2 çocuk annesi. Suna Hanım uzun yıllar network işi yaptıktan sonra bir işletme açmaya karar vermiş. Sonra yaşadığı çevrede insanların neye ihtiyaç duyduğu ve neyin eksik olduğuna dair bir araştırma yapınca çamaşır yıkama salonu açmış. Müşterileri genellikle üniversite öğrencileridir. Maya ‘dan aldığı krediler ile dükkanına deterjan, yumuşatıcı ve askı vb malzemeler aldı. Gelecekte işyerini genişletmek ve kuru temizleme dükkanı açmak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy detergents, softeners and clothes hangers

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is a single woman and owns a house that has piped water but no electricity. Her greatest monthly expense is food.
 
Judith has operated a tailoring business for the past 4 years. She makes women's suits and men's suits. Her potential clients are ladies and gents. She dreams of establishing a boutique in the future. 

With the KES 40,000, she wants to purchase cloth materials and sewing thread for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access financial support to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase cloth materials and sewing thread for her business.

loans.name: Derya

texts.en:
Derya is 37 years old and has a child. She worked in the private sector for many years and decided to start a business on her own. First she became a partner with a florist, then she bought her partner's share and became the sole owner. With the help of the loans from Maya, she purchased flowers in bulk and increased her profit. In the future she is planning to expand her business and be a brand. 

Translated from Turkish by Maya staff
Derya Hanım 37 yaşında ve bir çocuk annesi.  Derya Hanım uzun yıllar özel sektörde çalıştıktan sonra kendi işletmesini açmak istemiş.  Önce bir çiçekçi dükkanına ortak olarak girmiş daha sonra ortağının hakkını satın alarak kendi işletmesinin sahibi olmuş.  Maya’dan aldığı krediler ile toptan çiçek alarak karını artırdı.  Gelecekte dükkanını büyütmek ve marka olmak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy flowers in bulk

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy vehicle spare parts for her son's spare parts shop.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 23-year-old married man from Khan Younis city. He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. He also works  selling mobile accessories on a stall. It is a good business and provides the family with a good income. 
Ahmad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more products for his business to resell. By taking this loan, Ahmad will be able to increase his sales and also his income. Ahmad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy more products for his business to resell.

loans.name: Karine

texts.en: Karine lives with her family in Yerevan. She has a higher education and is an economist, but she never worked as she has been busy with her family care. Only Karine’s husband is employed in the family and they have a lot of financial hardships, especially with the education of their daughter. They have two children; a daughter and a son (school-aged). Their daughter, being very artistic and having a creative personality, decided to become a designer and now she studies at the Yerevan State Academy of Fine Arts in the faculty of Design and Applied Arts Department. She studies in the paid division, which is a really difficult problem for her family to overcome. So with this Kiva loan, Karine wants to pay her daughter’s tuition fee for the second semester. She is thankful beforehand to all the Kiva lenders who will decide to support her daughter with this loan.

loans.use: to pay her daughter’s tuition fee for the second semester

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seasonal fruit in bulk for her husband's fruit shop.

loans.name: Elif

texts.en:
Elif is 31 years old and she is single. She has been working in her father's dairy products shop since she was a kid. When her father got old, she took over the responsibility of the shop. With the help of the loan from Maya, she purchased dairy products in bulk and increased her sales.

Translated from Turkish by Maya staff
Elif hanım 31 yaşında bekar bir girişimci. Küçük yaşlardan itibaren babasıyla birlikte süt ve süt ürünlerinin satışını yaptığı bir dükkan işletiyor. Elif Hanım babası yaşlandıktan sonra işletmenin bütün sorumluluğunu kendi üstlenmiş. Maya’dan aldığı kredi ile toptan olarak dükkanına ürün aldı ve satışlarını artırdı.

loans.use: to buy dairy products in bulk

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, brick, re-bar and laminate sheeting to construct a plia  (washbasin/water tank) and a shed at her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the maintenance on her husband's truck, which is used to move construction materials

loans.name: Conselletta

texts.en:
Conselletta is a married woman. She has 5 children. She describes herself to be hardworking. She operates a retail business where she sells cereals. Her business is located in a busy area and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient working capital. 

She will use the Kes 50,000 loan to buy more stock of cereals. This is her second loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. Previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: buy more stock of cereals

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a solar panel system for the family home

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is a married woman who has seven children. She describes herself as ambitious and trustworthy. She operates a retail business where she sells animal feeds and other agrovet products. She has been involved in this business for 20 years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are farmers. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient working capital. She will use the KES 50,000 loan to buy more stock of animal feeds and agrovet products. Her business goal is to have high returns within five years. She hopes that in the future she will open a supermarket. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: buy more stock of animal feeds and agrovet products

loans.name: Gülşah

texts.en:
Gülşah is married and has a child.  For 10 years, she has been running her beauty and hairdresser salon.  She learned the business as she was working in a hairdresser salon.  She used prior two loans.  She bought solarium equipment for her salon.  With the help of her third loan, she is planning to buy the necessary equipment, hair dyes and beauty creams and expand her business.

Translated from Turkish by Maya staff
Gülşah hanım evli bir çocuk annesi.  On yıldır kuaför ve güzellik uzmanı olarak çalışmakta.  Meslek hayatına önce kuaför yanında çalışarak bu işi öğrendi.  İki kez mikro kredi kullandı.  Güzellik merkezine solaryum cihazı aldı ve gelen kadınlara hizmet ederek para kazandı.  Üçünü aldığı kredi ile de kuaför malzemeleri, saç boyası ve güzellik kremleri alarak para kazanmak ve işini geliştirmek istiyor.

loans.use: to buy the necessary equipment, hair dyes and beauty creams

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tires and maintenance for her husband's rickshaw.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw for her husband's transportation services.

loans.name: Danson

texts.en: Danson is a married man with eight children. He describes himself as determined. He operates a farm where he grows maize, beans, peas and other crops. He has been involved in this business for two years. His business is located in a good area and his primary customers are of all kinds. He describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient working capital. He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy farm inputs. He hopes that in the future, he will be prosperous. This is his second loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. His previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: buy farm inputs

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is a Kiva borrower. She operates a restaurant and has been involved in this business for 3 years. Her business is located in a busy area and her primary customers are locals. 

She will use the Kes 30,000 loan to buy stocks of ingredients for preparing food. Her business goal is to own a big hotel within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will have a good business and better living conditions. This is her second loan with SMEP Microfinance bank.

loans.use: buy stocks of ingredients for preparing food and to improve her family's living conditions

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to put up a structure for selling her bananas and to expand her farming activity .

loans.name: Nzingo

texts.en:
Nzingo is a married woman with four children all of  whom all attend school. She  lives in her own house that neither has electricity or piped water.  Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

She has operated a farming business, of planting tomatoes and vegetables for resale. She mentioned a major challenge of seasonality  in her place of operation.
With the loan she is requesting she wants to purchase seedlings and fertilizer for her business.She decided to join Yehu to boost her  farming business.

loans.use: to purchase seedlings and fertilizer for her business and to boost it also

loans.name: Armen

texts.en:
This young man is 31 years old and lives in the frontier village Khashtarak in the Tavush region. His name is Armen and in this nice village, which is surrounded with forests, he lives with his nice wife, his two children and his parents. Armen is a young farmer who has a cute farm but great plans of making it richer with cattle. 

On his farm he takes care of cows, piglets and chickens. With the help of his mother, from his farm Armen sells milk, macun (national dairy-product), cheese, pork and eggs. Near his house he has a large plot of land and on it he cultivates potatoes, beans, carrots and tomatoes. Armen also has a fruit garden with apples, apricots, nuts and mulberry trees. 

Armen’s mother sells all of his farm goods at the city’s wholesale market during the week. Armen will be very thankful if Kiva lenders help him buy more farm cattle. He will use this loan to purchase bulls and fodder for all of his farm cattle.

loans.use: for the purchase of bulls and fodder for his all farm cattle

loans.name: Dora Esther

texts.es:
Dora, de 54 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, debido a la situación económica de su familia, desde muy pequeña se dedicó a trabajar, está casada y su esposo trabaja en la agricultura, tiene siete hijos y todos ellos ya tienen su propio hogar, ella solo vive junto a su esposo.

Dora, se dedica a la elaboración de pan dulce, además tiene crianza de tilapia y una parcela de hortalizas, toda su vida se ha dedicado a este negocio, aprendió estos oficios por obligación, porque tenía que contar con una fuente de ingresos para ella y su familia, todo lo hace en su casa y su esposo es su mayor apoyo en el negocio. 

Dora, necesita el crédito pretende arreglar el piso de una galera donde tiene cerdos, ya tiene dos cerdas reproductoras y necesita más espacio para poder darles la atención que necesita, específicamente va a comprar materiales como arena, cemento y pagará mano de obra para que le realice el trabajo, también comprara un cerdo reproductor con el fin de aumentar su hato. 

Dora, desea ver ampliada su casa, también piensa en poner una panadería con toda clase de pan, para poder seguir ayudándole a su hijo en los estudios.
texts.en:
Dora is 54 years old and studied up to Grade 2. Due to her family's economic situation she went to work very early. She is married and her husband is a farmer. She has 7 children but they all have their own homes and she lives alone with her husband.

Dora works making pastries. She also raises tilapia and has a vegetable plot. She has worked in these businesses all her life. She learned them out of necessity as she had to have a source of income for her and her family. She does everything at home and her husband is her biggest support with her business. Dora needs a loan as she wants to fix the floor of a shed where she has pigs. She now has two breeding sows and she needs to have more room to give them the attention they need.

Specifically she is going to buy materials like sand, cement and to pay for labor to do this work. And she will buy a breeding sow with the goal of increasing her drive of pigs. Dora wants to expand her house and also is thinking of opening a bakery with all kinds of bread to be able to continue to help her son with his studies.

loans.use: to buy materials like sand, cement and to pay for labor and buy a sow to breed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an overlock sewing machine and fabric for her son's tailoring business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy iron rods for her husband's metal shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw material such as wooden planks, nails, glue, chip boards for her husband's furniture making business.

loans.name: Ana Deysi

texts.es: Ana de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida, ella se dedica a la venta de comida desde hace varios años, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda cambiando el techo pero ya que no cuenta con suficiente capital está solicitando un crédito para la compra de láminas, polines y pago de mano de obra y así poder tener una vivienda digna.
texts.en:
Ana, age 46, lives in her own home with her partner.  For several years she has worked selling food.  From her work she earns enough to pay for some of her household expenses.  

She wants to improve her home by putting on a new roof, but at this point she doesn’t have enough capital.  She is asking for a loan to buy sheet metal and purloins and to pay for the labor costs.  In this way, she will be able to have a worthy home.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal and purloins, and to pay for the labor costs to install a new roof

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy spare parts to repair and service his motorcycle and keep it in good condition. He hopes this will enable him to serve more customers and make more income.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for topdressing her crops for a better harvest for family use and those of clients in need of food supply.

loans.name: Alusine

texts.en:
This is 34-year-old Alusine. He is married and has three children aged 13, 10 and 4.  He has one additional dependent, who is his younger sister and is fostered.  In 2005, Alusine established his jeans, shirt, polo and shoe business. He began his business because he wants to be able to take care of his family's needs. His business is located in the city and his main customers are men.  Working six days a week and 11 hours a day, he earns about 1,305,000 SLL every month from this business. 

He would like a loan in the amount of 6,500,000 SLL.  Alusine requires a loan in order to buy additional dozens of jeans, belts and men's footwear. He hopes that this loan will increase his stock level and profit margin. In the future, Alusine plans to expand the business, for example, opening another outlet, and to provide quality education for his children. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy additional dozens of jeans, belts and men's footwear

loans.name: Mueni

texts.en:
Mueni is a married woman staying together with her husband and eight children. She owns a house that  has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past seven years, she has operated a charcoal-selling business. She sells from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of high cost of transportation. She dreams of expanding her business to a wholesale supplier of firewood in the village. 

With the KES 40,000 she wants to purchase bundles of charcoal for resale. She decided to join to Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of charcoal for resale

loans.name: Freedom Group

texts.en:
The three members in the photo are part of the group called Freedom, and they all live in the same neighborhood. They sell assorted soap, slippers and fried fish. Agnes (seen in the photo standing first from the right) is the group's representative. She is 50 years old and single and has grownup children. Agnes has been selling assorted soap from place to place for eight years. This allows her to take care of herself, as she is a school dropout and has no good parental care, she has to fend for herself. 

She buys her assorted soap from the wholesaler's and resells it at the market in Ghana. Agnes and the other members of her group would like to improve their businesses, so they have requested a second loan from the field partner, ID Ghana. Their previous loan was fully and correctly repaid.

loans.use: To buy her assorted soap from the wholesaler's and resell them at the market in Ghana.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in galvanized sheets of metal, wood, nails and wire to put the roof on his house.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MUJERES EMPRENDEDORAS, él banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huayllabamba, provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Modesta tiene 46 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 03 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al negocio de venta de productos secos, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de maiz, trigo entre otros.
Las socias en general se sienten agradecidas por el crédito otorgado y se comprometen a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the community bank MUJERES EMPRENDEDORAS. The bank is located in the Huallabamba district, in the Urubamba province and the department of Cusco.  

The member, Modesta, is 46 years old, lives with a partner and has 3 children.  The member alternates her daily activities, dedicating herself to selling dried products.  She has good experience with her business, which is going well thanks to the effort she puts forward each day.  The member wants to be able to continue working and in this way help her family.  

The member is requesting a loan to buy corn and wheat, among others.  The members feel grateful for the loans they have been awarded and promise to comply with the payment plan.

loans.use: to buy corn and wheat, among others.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en: Robert is 42 years old, married and blessed with four children. He does poultry farming and the business has been profitable. He sells the hatched chicks to other poultry farmers in the area. He will be using the loan to buy an incubator in hopes that this will enable him to get more chicks to sell to other poultry farmers.
